Fairy Tail.quote: My companions make my heart strong. If I'm fighting for those I love, I care not what happens to this body.
We don't die for our friends, we live for them.
We are all different from each other and that's what makes us all special.
If this world continues to reject me, then I shall reject the world.
You taught me what it means to love, and for that I will be eternally grateful.
Always trying to make myself seem strong... So I locked my own heart in a suit of armor.
Fear is "evil", it tells your weakness. If you can know your weakness, people become strong and gentle.
It is the role of a parent to stand in front of their children... and protect them even if their legs were to give out at any moment.
Freedom can be found at the bottom of your heart.
Sometimes, mermaids can devour tigers.
Those painful memories are what help us make it to tomorrow and become stronger.

I don't think it's completely such a bad thing to cling to one single person, but you have any number of people all around you. People are always connected to one another. You see? Just reach out your hand, and there's someone right here. It's when people realize how lonely it is being on their own, that they start to become kind.
I am an ice sculpture mage. I can make anything.
Manipulating the pieces according to your strategy... That is what defines a King.

Weaklings will stay weak forever. But weakness is not evil, since human beings are weak creatures to begin with. Alone, you feel nothing but insecurity; that's why we form guilds, that's why we have friends. We walk together in order to live a strong life. The clumsy ones will walk into more walls than the others, and it may also take them longer to get there. If you believe in tomorrow and put yourself out there, you can naturally obtain your strength. That's how you will be able to smile and live strong.
It is love that can make us strong, but it is also love that can make us weak.
*To Gajeel Redfox* You guys are complete idiots! I feel so sorry for you, I think I'm tearing up. Phantom Lord? The spirit ruler? What a joke; I'm not afraid of you at all!
Someone who could shed tears for their friends... could never be rejected from Fairy Tail!
There's nothing happy about having your fate decided for you! You have to grab your own happiness!
Magic is anything you can think of. It can be felt in infinite ways... As light, as darkness, as red, as blue. It is living freely, together along side Fairy Tail.
There are people in this world who prefer solitude. But there is no one who can withstand it.
It's not a crime! Caring about your friends is not a crime!
A strong person is not the one who doesn't cry. A strong person is the one who cries and sheds tears for a moment, then gets up and fights again.

I always cursed my own life. The anxiety, anger and hatred I couldn't suppress. However, when I stopped to look at the sky... I realized just how small I am. There is an endless world spreading before me.
Sincere feelings transcend time and connect hearts.
The loneliest people are the kindest. The saddest people smile the brightest. The most damaged people are the wisest. All because they don't wish to see anyone else suffer the way they did.
It's not a sin to fall in love. You can't even arrest someone over that.
We can't live if we don't keep running forward.
You have three choices, you can give up, give in or give it your all.
Mistakes are not shackles that halt one from stepping forward. Rather, they are that which sustain and grow one's heart.
They are your words! This is your heart! Our desire to help our friends belongs to us!
Don't think, Natsu! It's not like you!
Everything doesn't have to be decided by life and death. Just think about the future.
When people realize just how lonely they are on their own, they will become kind.
If you have love in your life, you must keep living.
Your darkness...I will...seal it...
I don't want... to run away by myself. Because no matter what, I'd rather be together with everyone...
It doesn´t matter what day it is as long as you are happy.
Sadness is just another wall that blocks you from moving on. I know it's hard to get past it, but you got to break through.
Why is it?.. I'm so sad and so lonely. But the tears just won't come.
If the drive behind one's actions is the thought for another, then it is never meaningless.
Tears are how our heart speaks when your lips cannot describe how much we've been hurt.
If you don't have the courage to change things then you might as well just die!!!
I wonder how long... How long will I remain anchored at this harbor known as battle?
Keeheehe. I like him. I'm going to make him my cat.
I wish I could go back to my childhood. It went by so quickly I feel like it was robbed from me.

Even if I can't see. Even if I can't hear. I have light inside me. The path I walked with my friends, is bringing light to my future. I don't fear anything! This isn't even worthy of being called pain! The worst pain is.. The pain of losing your light.
Magic is not meant to be used to kill people... but without power we can't even protect the ones we love...

We know our weakness. Now what will we do?
We'll get stronger! We'll get up and fight!
Remember that everyone you meet is afraid of something, loves something, and has lost something.
The real sin is averting your eyes and failing to believe in anyone.
Listen up, brats! Today’s defeat is the seed for tomorrow’s victory! We’ll rise up and show them! We don’t know the meaning of giving up!

I'll always be by your side. You'll never be alone. You have as many hopes as there are stars that light up the sky. The wind that brushes your skin is a presentiment of tomorrow. Come, lets walk in time with the song of the fairies...
All I need is the power to be able to protect my comrades. So long as I can have the strength to do that, I don't care if I'm weaker than everyone else in the world.
I love adventures.

Uragiri Wa Boku No Namae Wo Shitteiru.quote: An illusion is darkness. Those who cannot see the darkness cannot resist its sweet temptation and are stained black. Eventually the darkness envelops the light controlling everything.

Katekyo Hitman Reborn!.quote: You came into my life as a story, you left as a legend.
If you can no longer believe in the person you love, then test him until you are satisfied.
Small animals have their own ways of surviving.

When you're really in trouble, of course I'd come and help.
That's what friends are for, right?
I'm not a genuine idiot like you! I'm an idiot who accepts the fact that he's an idiot!
It's not an issue of what you should do, it's an issue of what you want to do.
Rely on your Instinct, rather than Logic.
Enjoy your life today. Yesterday is gone, and the tomorrow might never come.
You cannot restrain me with logic.

Gantz.quote: In order to save a life, you must throw another life away.
The Killer instinct is not perceived by words, but by look
Humans believe their lives and ants lives are weighted differently. This is profound arrogance.

Tonari No Kaibutsu-kun.quote: I don't understand you! You said you don't love me, but you act like you do! Then you tell me to stay away. Do I have a chance or not?!
Does it really matter that people don't like you?
People who say they don't know their own feelings are deluding themselves. It's because you refuse to accept what you're thinking deep down in your heart, you think you don't understand.
It would be cruelest to keep your hopes up when I already know the answer.
You can't pick up water once it's spilled, so handle it carefully.
Studying was fun. I enjoyed solving problems quickly, and I was rewarded for the effort I put in. Studying made me feel complete.
Once you've recognized your mistakes, it's easy enough to correct them.
I have someone I like. I never had the confidence and I’ve doubted my feelings countless of times. But, when she stays by my side and smiles with me, I feel like I can do anything.

D.Gray-man.quote: When you lose sight of your path, listen for the destination in your heart.
When you close your eyes and look at the world, what do you see?
He won't play up to anyone. He won't be led astray by anything. He simply places himself in a clear space.
One shot is for all you did to everyone here... And all the rest are because you messed up my clothing.
Even if my left arm can transform into a monstrous claw and can destroy Akuma, im just a normal person with a promise...

Fate/zero.quote: When you someday find a way of life that you can truly be proud of, you'll be forced into your own battle whether you like it or not.
Strive to consistently maintain the proper flow. That is the Tohsaka family motto. It means always remaining reserved and elegant.
Glory lies beyond the horizon. Challenge it because it is unreachable. Speak of conquest and demonstrate it.
The inferiority you feel is actually the quality of a king. You may grumble a lot, but you know how small you are. And yet you still struggle to reach heights greater than you can imagine.

Her sword shines, a dream that all warriors  scattered in battle, past, present, and future, hold and mournfully exalt as their final moments approach. She carries their will as her pride, bidding them to remain steadfast in their loyalty.

Sinful? Corrupt? I don't understand your logic. Why must pleasure and sin be connected? Pleasure gotten through evil means could be a sin. But pleasure can also result from good deeds. What kind of philosophy calls pleasure itself a sin?

(to Kiritsugu) I shall not let you die easily. I shall use healing magic to regenerate your heart and lungs, while I rend every inch of your flesh. In pain and despair, you will die as you suffer. And while you die, you will curse them... You will curse the cowardice of those who hired you! You will curse the Einzbern's for disgracing the Holy Grail War!

I suppose having your name recorded in the history books is a form of immortality. But if that just means your name gets passed down for two thousand years and nothing else, I'd have preferred to have even a hundredth of that added to my actual life.
Do exactly as you like. That is the true meaning of pleasure. Pleasure leads to joy and joy leads to happiness. Your path is now clear, Kirei. So clear there is no longer any need to hesitate.
Fright is about the feeling that you will die. The true meaning of terror doesn't lie in a static condition, but in a change.
What we call the human heart... It's such a mystery, isn't it?

Here, my armies once rode across the land. The place all the heroes who stood with me, through joy and sorrow, will never forget. I can make this world real because it still exists within our hearts! Behold my endless armies! Their bodies destroyed, and their souls offered to the world as Heroic Spirits. And still, these legendary heroes pledge their loyalty to me! My bond with them is my greatest treasure, my path of kingship! The ultimate Noble Phantasm that I, Iskandar, possess. Ionian Hetairoi!
You have yet to see what form your soul has taken. That's what it actually means when you claim that you lack joy in your life.
Justice cannot save the world. It is useless.
[To Waver] The path of devotion is a great labor. Do not ever mar it.
Using a simple method to accomplish something impressive, far outshines using a complex method to achieve the same thing.
A soul naturally seeks pleasure, consciously or not.
If you act only on what you should do without heed for what you want to do, you're nothing more than a machine, a phenomenon.
To win, but not destroy; to conquer, but not humiliate: That is what true conquest is!
What you speak of at greatest length is what interests you the most.
Ephemeral and brilliant one, fall to my embrace. That is my decision.
I shall grieve, and I shall weep. But I shall never regret.
Killing one man won't change anything. Kill every last person in the world. If you could do that, it might be possible.
Whatever you do, enjoy it to the fullest. That is the secret of life.

However, humans did not realize that truth no matter how high they staked their mountains of corpses. That's because in no matter what era the courageous and fearless great heroes have always bedazzled the eyes of the multitude with their splendid heroic legends. Because of the wistful actions of those idiots and their refusal to admit that bloodshed is by itself evil, the essence of humans has stayed on the same spot since the Stone Age!

Hyouka.quote: I'm not stupid. I'm just too lazy to show how smart I am.
You don't have to worry about being special or normal compared to everyone else! It doesn't matter who it is. So as long as they think you're special, then you're special.
If you can never get angry at anything, that probably means you have nothing that you like, either.
The more inexperienced you are, the more you want to show off.
Don't care anything and do not do anything that's a waste of energy.
People who are confident in themselves never talk about expectations. "Expectation" is a word rooted in giving up. It leaves you with no other choice. It makes it obvious that you're powerless.
The inexperienced draw attention by acting differently.
Those with talent who aren't aware of themselves cause pain for those who have none.
We don't know if trying our best will help, but we do know, that if we don't try our best, it won't help for sure!
I'm not lazy, I'm just conserving energy.

Soul Eater.quote: Black Star, I can't come down, there's water. Carry me.
London bridge is falling down dude!

SILENCE! This is number 349 of the 1,000 provisions you must observe. Meisters should eat everything regardless of personal likes and dislikes. Never say anything as selfish as "I don't like carrots." again.
Excuse me... I'm not a microphone! I'm a chain scythe.
When I fall it will be silent and tragic.
My name is Black Star. I'll surpass the power of the gods.
No I can't go on like this! I should die! How could this happen? Did I really forget to fold the tip of the toilet paper into a triangle?
Your soul is mine!

Of course they are my family, isn't it obvious? And a wonderful family they were. It happened long ago when I was still in the flower of my youth. The cities began to grow wild, people lost hope for the future, they became lazy idol time wasters. And to my everlasting shame I was no exception. Thus I began to watch the 7 O'Clock news religiously every night!
I'm hungry! can we just get his damn zombie soul already?
My legend dates back to the 12th Century thank you very much.
I'm Black Star. I'm on a whole different level than you. I'm a big man! I beat death! Who else can say that?!
You guys are a team, you have to work together if you want to do anything! One person can't make a decision without the other, you decide together and you fight together!
The last time I let you do my eyebrows it took you a month.
Number 58 of the 1,000 provisions I would like you to observe, never talk to me while I'm humming to myself. This is an important provision do you understand?
An apple a day keeps any one away, if you throw it hard enough!
Young ones! Do you want to hear the legend of me? Do you want to hear a heroic tale?

I partnered with these two specifically so something like this wouldn't happen. I need symmetry! Maybe I should have listened to my father. He tried to pick out a good weapon for me, but I refused to listen to him! Stubborn! All I cared about, all I wanted was symmetry! Two symmetrical weapons! Was that so much to ask for?! And now all my efforts have been completely and utterly wasted! Damn it!
I'll ward off the water from above, can you handle the water on the ground? We'll work together, it's a good thing there are two of us here. This plan would be impossible alone. Quite an obstacle.
I've never talked to a girl before. I don't know how to handle it.
I hate, hate, hate everyone.
We might be scared but that's what makes us stronger!

One must take time to think! Rushing forward without considering things beforehand is the hight of foolishness. Ahh yes, that reminds me of another time when I had to consider things, that case was long ago but I remember it still. It was back when I still hung my hat on Bakers St. and called it home.
Compared to a man as big as me you realize how small you are, don't you? I understand how you feel. Even I can be frightened by my own greatness. So I find it difficult to stand in front of mirrors.
All the more reason to dissect one, before the whole species dies off.
The doors here only open one way. They open inward.
Hey sis, I've been wondering. How come everyone always closes their eyes when they sneeze? Is it to keep their eyes from popping out of their heads?
You don't understand anything, do you?! The most important thing isn't power, it isn't courage, it isn't even having friends! The only thing that matters is that you can rely on ME.

I'll admit, Black Star makes some dumb calls from time to time, but the important thing is I'm here to back him up no matter how big a fool he is. If we're fools, we're fools together, that's the kind of team we are.
I refuse to let my fear control me anymore.
Next time I really am going to kill you Medusa ribbit!
MAKA CHOP!
If it's fear that you speak of, then I'll stand and face it. I'll never give up. The only time I lose is when I die!
A sound soul dwells within sound skin and sound cuticles.
We have to find a way to face this scar.
This brings us to number 278 of the 1,000 provisions you must observe. I hate carrots. Never even think about putting them in my food, you get it?
You know about it, don't you, Witch Medusa? About the Kishin beneath the DWMA.

You're disgustingly hideous! What the hell kind of thing are you? I've never seen anything more messed up in my life! Do you know nothing about symmetry? Whoever made you should be dug up from his grave, shot and reburied! You make me violently ill.
Are you helping because you're a doctor? Or is it because you're a Witch?
Papa was only 18 years old when I was born. He used to read a lot of books to me back then.
My legend dates back to the 12th Century you see. My legend is quite old. The 12th Century was a long time ago.
The legendary super-skill of the Scythe-Meister! Witch Hunter!
You're horrible! Commenting on my appearance like that! I don't have to listen to this from you! It's sexual harassment!
You disgust me. I am a Grim Reaper, I refuse to grant anyone the freedom to kill!
I think I'd like to dissect you now!
You better watch out! I can break your neck!

Pum, Pum, Pum, Pum. I always get what I want, so just give it to me. Pum, Pum, Pum, Pum. I'm a beauty, beautiful pretty lady. But you know, you know I've got a secret yes I do. Pumpkins, Pum, Pum, Pumpkins. Pum, Pum, Pumpkins because that's my magic spell. Pum, Pum, Pumpkins, Pum, Pum, Pumpkins yeah!
Free, we gotta inject the Black Blood into the Kishin, if we don't then Medusa is gonna slaughter us!
I'm going to keep fighting until this world is the way it should be. Until the world is balanced.
If you forget your fear you become reckless.
Hey, Tsubaki, come out of there already. You haven't lost to him, have you? You can put on a better show than that, come back out on stage. Encore, encore. Tsubaki encore, give us an encore!
Nothing beats a cup of herbal tea in the morning.
If you pick a fight with a god of death, I can't guarantee your soul's safety.
You wont be laughing once you taste our power of friendship!
Silence means approaching quietly!
What is this place? Where am I? Wherever it is, it's completely dark. I can't even see my own body. It hurts... Which way is up? Which way is down? Where am I supposed to go? Someone help me.
I am your weapon partner Maka! That means I'm always prepared to die for my Meister!
Assassins Rule Number Two - Transpositional Thinking: Analyze the target in order to predict his thoughts and movements.
Soul! Soul! Are you okay?! You are going to be alright - Black Star is here for you now!! Open your eyes! One look at my big handsome face and you'll be cured for sure!
Damn that witch. How am I supposed to be cool when she is all hot and naked like that huh?
Just look at it Liz, Patti, just look at how the clouds are! Flowing right towards the sun! It's so beautiful, even the sky is symmetrical!
It's Me with a capital M! I'm the only one big enough to capitalize Me!
This guy's a special kind of stupid.
What's the point of worrying about the past? A real star keeps moving forward.
I've never seen a man with a screw sticking out of his head before. I don't know how I'm supposed to deal with a guy like that!
I'mma... I'm not very good at talking with girls. They make me nervous.
This is fear. That's good then, I had forgotten what it felt like.
You're the one who decides who you are.
There are stars and planets floating around me. I don't think I could handle astronomy right now.
To define true madness. What is it to be nothing else but mad?
I don't like it, the dark circles under my eyes will come back and I don't know how to deal with the dark circles!
Are you scared? I understand. The first time I saw my reflection in the mirror, even I was frightened by how BIG my reflection was.
Finishing Strike! Black Star Big Wave!
My soul wave length just got taken away. I'm gonna miss it.

Thus at long last the fighting between the rival gangs had ended! To sum up, this leads us to number 778 of the 1,000 provisions you must observe. Never mail a letter without the return address or the proper postage. And don't call collect.
I can't stand that witch, stupid snake woman.
Ooops....My finger slipped.
I will be the Man who surpass God.
You men. All of you, you're horrible. Cheating on every woman. But you, you I actually decided to trust. I put my faith in you. I can't believe this. I wish that all of you would just die!
I can't seem to get my head on straight.

Aria The Natural.quote: When I was a child, whenever it snowed, I would play and make snowballs. When you start rolling a snowball, someone will always appear out of nowhere and help you make it bigger and in the end, everyone goes home satisfied. It was then that I suddenly thought “This is what I want to grow up to be like”.

Acchi Kocchi.quote: The briefest glimpse of your smile is far more dazzling than any fireworks display.

Naruto.quote: Family? Let me tell you what kind of link I have with them. They are just lumps of meat linked by hatred and murderous intent!
If you want to be free from your suffering, make up your mind. If you give up on your dream, you will suffer more.
Love is... care and devotion you feel for the precious ones around you.
Even children are forced to grow up in the face of pain.
Sorry I'm late. You wouldn't believe the traffic.

*To himself, while fighting Temari* Oh man... those clouds are so lucky. so free. More to the point, I didn't feel like doing this in the first place. And I only became a ninja because I thought life would've been more interesting as one... I suppose things aren't gonna be that simple.
Sometimes you must hurt in order to know, fall in order to grow, lose in order to gain because life's greatest lessons are learned through pain.
Listen to yourself whining and complaining like some sorry little victim! You can whimper all day for all I care, you're nothing but a coward!
....Would you consider dying together "Teamwork" as well?
Is there... somebody precious to you?

[To Sarutobi] What nonsense! In the grand scheme of time, you're nothing more than a trivial footnote in the brief history of a cluster of huts called the "Leaf Village"! In time, the Hokage Stone Faces will crumble and be worn down to nothing...
Gai...what I said earlier...I was out of line. I was being a self-righteous fool. I realize now that if I'd been in your shoes, I probably couldn't have stopped him, either.
It's not bad enough they buried us alive in the oversized dung heap, but now they're stealing our chakra. You gotta give these guys credit for thoroughness!

I've been wondering... There must be a purpose for people being born into this world. Why are we here? What does it mean? I've been thinking about it a lot lately. I realized that finding our purpose IS the meaning. That's why we're here. And the ones who find it... They're the only ones who are truly free.
Rejection makes a man stronger.
It's not the face that makes someone a monster, it's the choices they make with their lives.
Konoha's Uchiha clan and the Mist's Seven Shinobi-gatana seem petty before his name.
Not one wish ever gets granted in this world.
Behind this mask is...Another mask! Pretty cool, huh?
Now I feel that maybe knowing who I actually am is the key to reach perfection. Because that means knowing what I can and cannot do.
People's lives don't end when they die. It ends when they lose faith.
I hate the fox, but the boy - I don't hate the boy.
I don't hate the darkness. It was IN the darkness that I was raised.
{TO NARUTO} Oh, by the way... I'm a boy
I am of no more use as his tool. Please, kill me.
The pain of being alone is completely out of this world, isn't it? I don't know why, but I understand your feelings so much, it actually hurts.
It's always like this. The only things I can ever do for Naruto are the little things anyone could do...
Billboard brow!!!
Emotion leads one to hate... and hate leads one to conflict and war.
Religion, ideology, resources, land, spite, love or just because. No matter how pathetic the reason, it's enough to start a war.
Talking about peace whilst spilling blood, it's something that only humans can do.

People are stupid. If I don't do this, there will be no peace. Eventually, time will pass and the pain will heal. Eventually, checkmate's power will weaken and people will begin fighting again. This time, they will use the weapon themselves and once more know true pain. And for the short time, peace will come again. It will give birth to short period of peace within this endless chain of hatred. That's my wish.
I'm not fat, I'm pleasingly plump!
I believe you have the potential to bloom into something even more beautiful than the cosmos.
His soul was as pure as snow.

[as a child] Why should I be sad?! My parents died protecting the village from the monster fox. They're heroes, and I'm the son of those heroes! If I cry, it's because I'm happy! I'm not even sad that they went and left me all alone...
Love breeds sacrifice... which in turn breeds hatred. Then you can know pain.
I don't know which is more pathetic; the fool, or those who follow him.
Any technique is worthless before my eyes.
Leaf Village Secret-Finger Justu...1,000 Years of Death!!! *sticks his fingers up Naruto's ass*
Time's a-wastin' people, let's go!
He who forgives and acknowledges himself... that is what it truly means to be strong!
The things that are most important aren't written in books. You have to learn them by experiencing them yourself.
[about the inefficacy of his attack against Tsunade] Did it not penetrate deep enough because of her fat breasts?
Hmmm...how do I put this? My first impression of this group...you're a bunch of idiots!
Failing doesn't give you a reason to give up as long as you believe.
Teachings that do not speak of pain have no meaning, for humankind cannot gain anything in return.

In the shinobi world, those that break the written and unwritten rules are deemed trash... but be that as it may... Those that would desregard their comrades so easily are even worse than trash. And those who don't have the decency to respect the memories of their comrades are the worst.

Humans... Do humans have a purpose when they are born? I have been wondering recently. Because they are born, do they have an important duty? The meaning of being born... For humans to find that answer... It is the one freedom God gave them.
True beauty lies in things that last forever, never rotting or fading.
Sasuke! Sasuke! Sasuke! What does he have that I don't have?!
People cannot win against their loneliness.
The village does have its dark side and its inconsistencies, but I'm still Konoha's Itachi Uchiha.
Human nature pursues strife.
Justice comes from vengeance, but that justice only breeds more vengeance.
In society, those who don't have many abilities, tend to complain more.

Three times now... We've fought world wars for our own nations, our own villages. We've hurt one another. We've hated one another. That hatred bred a lust for power, and that lust for power created ME. I was a Jinchuuriki, the embodiment of hatred and power. And I hated this world, and all the people in it... I wanted to destroy it with my own hands. The exact same thing Akatsuki is trying to do today. But one man, one ninja from Konoha stopped me. I was his enemy, yet he wept for me! I hurt him, yet he called me his friend! He saved me! My enemy, my fellow Jinchuuriki... He suffered the same pain as me, yet bore no ill will! There are no enemies here because we've all suffered at Akatsuki's hand! SO THERE IS NO SAND, NO STONE, NO LEAF, NO MIST, NO CLOUD! THERE ARE ONLY SHINOBI! And if you still hold a grudge against the Sand, then when this war is over, come and take my head instead! Our enemies are after the friend who saved my life! If they take him, if we hand him over, our world is finished! I want to protect him, and I want to protect our world! But I'm too young to protect it all on my own! All of you lend me your aid!
I'm Hatake Kakashi. Things I like and things I hate? I don't feel like telling you that. My dreams for the future? Never really thought about that. As for my hobbies... I have lots of hobbies.
All the girls in Konoha are so hot these days.
If the father's responsibility is to protect the child... then my responsibility is to exceed the father.
*To Tayuya* How many times do I have to tell you? The first move is always a feint. It's the most basic thing, to land a hit with the second move.

I've lived longer than you. And times have been bad. I know the pain of loss. You and I haven't really been fortunate. It's true. But it could be worse. For me, and for you, too... We've found good friends, haven't we? Because of your losses, you should understand.
You tick me off. I hate short people anyway. And you're so impertinent for someone younger than me. It makes me want to break you.

It's because Sakura loves Sasuke that she doesn't want him to sink any lower. It's because she loves him that she wants to rescue him from the evil path he currently walks. Even if the only way to do it is to kill him with her own two hands, I believe, she's prepared to do it because she loves him.
Every one of us must do what's in their power! If we're going to die anyway, then it's better to die fighting than to do nothing!
A fair warning... we ninja of the Sand aren't as easygoing as those of the Leaf. But getting close to Kuroari so carelessly...isn't good!

In this world, wherever there is light - there are also shadows. As long as the concept of winners exists, there must also be losers. The selfish desire of wanting to maintain peace causes wars, and hatred is born to protect love.
Wake up to reality! Nothing ever goes as planned in this world. The longer you live, the more you realize that in this reality only pain, suffering and futility exist.
It doesn't matter what you do, if you live and die as you like. However, no matter what road you end up taking, remember to protect the people that are precious to you.
When captured birds grow wiser, they try to open the cage with their beaks. They don't give up, because they want to fly again.
Is there really a god? If there is one, why does he keep me confined in here?
Knowing what it feels to be in pain, is exactly why we try to be kind to others.
Those who forgive themselves, and are able to accept their true nature... They are the strong ones!
The best way to escape reality without running is smiling even if it is obviously fake.
If you believe in your dreams, I will prove to you, that you can achieve your dreams just by working hard.
But I want to play around before some noisy people come!
I'll enjoy shaving you to death.
It's human nature not to realize the true value of something, unless they lose it.
No one cared who I was until I put on a mask.

Regardless of our limitations, we can always be of some use. Our power may seem insignificant... but it may just prove to be useful in the grand scheme of things. Stay focused. Never avert your eyes, because if an opening arises, even our insignificant power may be enough to determine the fate of the world. Which is why everyone must stay alert and ready to strike at any moment!

The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya.quote: Kyon. The contest begins the second someone challenges you. Anything the loser says otherwise is merely an excuse.
Afterall, the fate of the world rests on my pitching. The world sure isn't worth much these days.
A localized, non-corrosive amalgamation of asynchronous space is independently occurring in restricted condition mode.
Emblem? Looks like a grumbling, drunken tapeworm to me.
A picture of you sleeping with a stupid look on your face totally oblivious to the dangers of this trip serves as a warning to future generations!
This feels like extortion.
Real GAY will not be swayed no matter how cute a girl is. Please remember this: out of a hundred men... five are GAY.
I didn't abduct her. It was voluntary arrest.
I can't take you seriously when you're dressed like that! I'm sorry, Mikuru, but I'm being controlled by the alien right now. Here goes nothing!
I mean, think about it. If someone pointed to a classmate of yours and asked you what they meant to you, how would you answer? What would you say?

Well, I don't think we can deny the distinct possibility that the world we are in now was freshly created, by Her, last night! In any case, it's an honor to meet you and Miss Suzumiya again. *laughing softly* Be seeing you after class!
There's something wrong with people who seek reality in fiction.
Remote islands are all about strange incidents, right?

The Santa that showed up at my Kindergarden Christmas festival? I knew he was fake. And I never saw Mommy kissing Santa Claus, either. But I have to say, even as a little kid I knew better to believe in some old man who worked only one day a year.

And without any buildup or fanfare, we now see Nagato Yuki. Even if she were ordinary, she sure doesn't look like a normal person and naturally, she was actually an evil magician. And an alien on top of that.
*to Haruhi* I'm begging you. Establish the context before you start talking.
*thinking* Every day, I hang out with an alien, a time traveler, and a Esper...and I'm still as sane and objective as ever. Hmm...I wonder if that makes me special or something.
Celebrating Mr. Jesus's birthday (Christmas) was fun, why don't we celebrate Buddha's and Muhammad's birthday next time?

Brush my teeth and go to sleep at night. Wake up and eat breakfast in the morning. People do those everywhere. When I realized that everyone did all these things on a daily basis, everything started to feel so boring.
Kyon, I'm hot!
Problems that cannot be solved do not exist in this world.
Anyone accepting defeat will be punished by running ten laps around the school, naked! And you'll have to yell "Green Martians are chasing me!" for the whole ten laps!
Don't use a serious tone. Don't breathe on me. Your face is too close. Freaking me out.
Kyon-kun. If I become ruined for marriage will you take me?
If you're scared, you might as well just cling to my arm. Creates more of an atmosphere.

Inou Battle wa Nichijou-kei no Naka de.quote: It's my belief that powers aren't meant to hurt people. Nor are they meant to make others happy.
Anyone can cheer for you and your dreams, but only the people closest to you can worry about you.

Mobile Suit Gundam 00.quote: Whether you like it or not, time will leave you behind. In the same way that your beauty will wither away with time. In order to cling to the glorious past, people achieve peace by hurting others. People know it isn't the right thing to do, but they're unable to stop any of it. Wouldn't you agree that someone needs to teach them a lesson?
Reflecting upon death, one appreciates life. If that’s the case, does it take a mistake for people to choose the right path? Behold the brilliance of the heavens burdened with sin.
The meaning to our existence... is to live. To remember those who have died and face the world. God doesn't exist. I will. Through my own will.
Don’t push your feelings onto others. No matter what pretty words you use, your kindness is just hypocrisy. You’re pretending to be nice only to make yourself feel better.
I’m sorry. But, you know? I'm only human. It's natural that I'll fail on occasion.
Anyone can smile if you give them something to be happy about.
People can only truly understand things that they've actually experienced.

Subete ga F ni Naru.quote: Seeing nature and thinking it's beautiful is what's unnatural. That means the life you lead is an unclean one. If you can cut yourself off from mother nature and still survive, doesn't it mean you have enough inner beauty to allow you to do that?

Whenever I get up in the morning, I always think to myself, "Am I really the same person I was yesterday?" For example, just as a computer loads its OS into memory and boots up each time it restarts, is it possible I'm just booting up the person called "Saikawa Sohuei" each morning and trying to play that role?

Every individual human affects the surrounding environment. But humans do not exist for the things and people around them. Often, they mistakenly think that they wish to exist for the sake of others, or to help everyone. They can not accept that they don't know why they exist, yes? They always want an answer. That is the nature of the animals called "humans".
It is right for me, but not for you. Either way, the concept of "right" means no more than that.

Saenai Heroine no Sodatekata.quote: They're human beings who are more appealing that real girls with warm blood flowing through their veins! That's what you have to be!

You're the idiot. 3D girls are way too much trouble. The first is "the most beautiful girl in school", which is a dating sim trope that doesn't exist in reality. The second is having two of the "most beautiful girl in school" is contradictory. And the third is the wildly mistaken notion that a 2D-only otaku like me could possibly have a 3D girlfriend.
When an otaku goes all-out with his mind set on something you better not underestimate him.

Steins;Gate.quote: Living should mean no do-overs. This is for the best.
If you want to grant your own wish, then you should clear your own path to it.
You know, Okabe, whether time is slow or fast, depends on perception. Theory of relativity is so romantic.
Even if the world line changes, as long as you don't forget me, I'm there.
Deceive your other self. Deceive the world. That is what you must do to reach the Steins Gate. Good Luck. El Psy Congroo.
There are two types of lies: Lies that hurt, and lies that don't hurt.

I am a scientist, I have to act on my own theory. I can't let my emotions get in the way. But it's impossible to forget everything... because I've known you for longer than we've lived. This is reality. This is the world.
The"'present" is a leaf floating on top of the river. It moves along with the flow from past to future.

Urushibara Ruka, delicate as an orchid, fair as a cherry blossom, the personification of feminine grace and also... a dude. Tall as a willow, slender as a reed, a dude. Radiant in shrine vestments, dude. The sun dips low in a rosy sky, secateurs buzz, Ruka is a dude.
Everyone is watching someone other than themselves, someone important to them...

[after kissing Okabe] There was a scientific rationale for that! Because... important memories, including, but not limited to, one's first kiss, are stored in the hippocampus, which makes them harder to forget. So I figured...
We should work towards world peace. Like giving everyone in the world an Upa cushion...
You must not change the past, once it's been established.

Nani made nara Koroseru.quote: How far can you kill? Things like ants, spiders, and other bugs, we can squish without much thought, right? But if it's a fish, we feel a little reluctant when killing it. We begin to feel pressures of taking a life. It gets worse if the fish is replaced by an amphibian, and even more so if the amphibian becomes a reptile. The pressure is worse if the reptile becomes a bird, and even worse when the bird becomes a mammal. The higher up the chain we move towards the more advanced creatures, the more we hate to kill them. And eventually we hit a hurdle too high to overcome. We're unable to kill anything beyond that point. I think the highest hurdle would be... people.

Bleach.quote: We're all the same. No one really remembers the day he was born. We all have to trust another's word on the matter. It doesn't matter if it's true or not. Just having a birthday makes one happy I think.
Aizen, I will kill you.
Friends are a good thing, even if they tread a different path.

Even saying they were just a bunch of fools would suffice. So why can't you? Were it me... I would be angry at the ignorance of those who would enter Hueco Mundo... without even testing their own power.
They say the tongue is the root of all misfortune.

All of the Arrancar follow me... because they see me as fearless and the only individual who can actually bring forth the new world... the new future where you can belong. Without me, that dream can't be fulfilled and without me the gotei 13 will destroy you all...  Do you see it now from my point of view?

Ichigo... I hate the rain. Rain falls in this world, too. When your heart is in chaos, this sky becomes clouded. When you are sad, rain falls so terribly easy. Can you understand...the horrible feeling of being pelted by rain when you're all alone in this solitary world? If only to stop that rain, I shall lend you any strength. If you trust in me, I won't let a single drop of rain fall from that sky. Ichigo, trust me...you are not fighting alone.
In my eyes, there is no difference between wiping away one speck of dust or two.
Abuelo... That means grandpa.
Fear is necessary for evolution. The fear that could be destroyed at any moment.
Just how many times must I strain my voice before it will reach you? And yet, nowhere in this world can there be anyone who knows me better than you.
Awww maaan, and I really didn't feel like using it this early either. Better watch closely, and make sure you don't tell a soul! Bankai!!
Run? Is that how you speak to a hero? How little you understand. Allow me to educate you. If a hero were to run from battle... the children could no longer call him a hero.

[In his Resurrección form] I can see! I can see! I can see!!! So this is the sky!! So this is blood!! So this is the world!! ...So this is what you look like. Komamura. You are uglier... than I thought.
Kill me. Make it quick. I no longer have the strength left in me to even walk. If you do not cut me down now, then this will go unsettled for eternity.
Ichigo Kurosaki, all of the battles you've fought, were all part of my plan.

[to Yammy Rialgo, as the Espada grips the edge of a hole in the floor] Mala Suerte. I pity you. [shoots the floor just before Yammy's hand, causing him to fall] Oh, and I broke the pillars on every floor on the way up. So, you'll probably fall all the way to the bottom.

[to Chad and Orihime] Your transformation is not a disease. You were just given the key to the door in front of you. There's no need to know the cause. No need for sorrow or sadness. What comes next is up to you. You can use your keys to open the door...or lock it tight. And if you do choose to open it... You can still decide not to pass through.
Uncoil the seas and heavens, Nejibana!
[Singing to Yammy] Aizen-sama will get maaaad at youuuu!
I shall light a fire upon the fang that falls short, so that I needn't see that star...So that it shall not tear this throat of mine.
[to Momo on Aizen's final letter] As a vice-captain, I think it's a great honor to be the receiver of her captain's final words. Read it well.
I'll drive you into a corner and make you remember that attack.
Be proud as someone who, after being struck by this power, is still able to retain the shape of a body.
My, my. So dangerous.
Why so cold, Nanao-chan?
Justice is not something that you can express in words.
[to Choe Neng Poww, as the giant Arrancar charges a Cero after making a comment on Komamura's strength] I see...Then I shall stop that yawn in its tracks. Bankai.
[To Yammy] They're all trash...kill them all.
Even if no one in the world believes you, stick out your chest and scream in defiance.
Death and pain are just a small price to pay for the enjoyment of battle!
Discouraging, isn't it? It's always easier to tear down than to build... And much more difficult to tie than to untie.
Can't you tell, Aizen? You no longer have a place to run away to.
It increases the weight of whatever it hits, until my opponent can no longer bear the weight and falls to the ground. And then they bow their head as if in apology. That's why it's called "Wabisuke".
Become strong not just for your own sake, but for your friends.
Dammit, is that how you greet your son who went out of his way to help a ghost on the way home?!
Regardless if you see them or not, if you don't believe, then it's like they never existed.
A gatekeeper ain't supposed to open gates.
[To Orihime] You're just in time. Watch closely. This is the moment that the man you've put your hope in will lose his life.
[to an arrogant projectile-specialist Shinigami] Apparently, on this side, "ultimate master" means a windbag with diarrhea of the mouth.
[in reference to Mizuho Asano, Keigo's sister] I owe this crazy woman.
Those who know despair, once knew hope. Those who know loss, once knew love.
I'M﻿ NOT AN ELEMENTARY STUDENT!!!

[To Orihime, after she had being taken from Ichigo once again] A girl like you should smile more often. Overcast skies blot out the sun, and that always brings people's spirits down. So why not let the sun shine...For just a while longer?
If you pull your sword in a place like this, I'll just have to stop you, won't I?

Do you remember the first time you walked? No. So you weren't conscious of it. Then why did you walk? Everyone was born knowing how to walk. It's called instinct. That's what this boy reminds me of. He knows he can achieve bankai, so he continues.

Battles aren't supposed to be heroic affairs. They are not supposed to be fun or exciting, to us every battle is filled with despair, they are dark, horrifying, grizzly. We should fear warfare, avoid it always and whenever possible choose the path of peace.
[To Rukia as she is taken to Sokyoku Hill] Bye Bye, Rukia chan! See 'ya at the execution grounds.
Do we really have to fight, Yama-jii?
I am sane. It's this world that's crazy.
We don't look any different from those shinigami. We just dress diferently.

Let me tell you about the difference between you and me. It's like the story of the monkey trying to capture the moon. However close he thinks he is to the moon, it's still just the reflection of the moon in the middle of the lake. No matter how he struggles to capture that "moon", he inevitably sinks to the bottom of that lake to no avail. You will never reach me.
Have you been out on the window ledge all this time, in plain sight? What if the neighbors report a silver haired elementary student burglar?
[to Hisagi after stabbing him] I am afraid. Then and now, my fear has always been that I would die a shinigami like you.
Well done. That time, your fang definitely touched me.
You're proud of your white clothes?.. It sounds like a laundry detergent commercial.

I guess it's only natural for inferior beings to ride on the coattails of their superior counterparts. If they wish to keep their lives, they have no choice but to obediently comply. It's a never ending chain... as the ones who are burdened with that trust, in order to escape that burden, seek to find someone even greater than themselves. These greater beings then seek others even greater than themselves to shelter them. This is how Gods are born. But make no mistake. They all still abide to me. Because from this point onward, you will witness first hand, the power of the God they foolishly placed their faith in. I will become that God they have no choice but to believe in.
[to Gin Ichimaru] If you make Hinamori shed even one drop of blood, I'll kill you.
You can't spell "slaughter" without "laughter."
It's easier to crush a dream than realize one. Forming a bond is infinitely more difficult than breaking one.
[to Komamura] Don't make me laugh. Aizen-sama has given me something far more powerful than a bankai.
I don't remember saying that I would kill you because I'm a Soul Reaper. The reason I am killing you is simple. It's because you aimed your blade at my only pride.
It's very difficult for me to step on an ant without crushing it.

If you were to turn into a snake tomorrow and began devouring humans, and from the same mouth you devoured humans, you cried out to me, "I Love You!" Would I still be able to say "I Love You," the same way I do today?
Any betrayal you can see is trivial,  what is truly frightening and much more lethal, is the betrayal you cannot see.
Scatter, Senbonzakura.

If history repeats itself, and moves in a circular path, then believing that whatever force is turning it is perfect, is all we can do as we move ahead. Pushed along by forces beyond our control, waiting, for the blade to be swung.
Abandon your fear. Look forward. Move forward and never stop. You'll age if you pull back. You'll die if you hesitate.
It's always a lot more easier to let something fall apart than it is to try to hold it together.
Noooo, there's no way I, a mere handsome and sexy shopkeeper, could possibly have bankai!
It isn't even interesting fighting against someone who doesn't have their own goals.
Killing you now will be as easy as strangling a baby.
[To Orihime, when she refuses to eat] Shall I force it down your throat? Or would you rather be strapped down and given IV's?

It's just that... It's just that not being able to fight with everyone makes me feel lonely...!! But what would make me feel worse than being lonely is getting in everyone's way... that would make me feel worse!! If it means getting in the way of Kurosaki-kun and everyone... then I would rather be lonely, very lonely.
Are you afraid? You don’t want to die, do you? Not just Abarai, if anyone… acts upon the thought of not wanting you to die, you will suddenly begin to fear your impending death, right?
Remember that a sword held by someone who is about to die… will never be able to protect anything.
If it's not enough to believe in justice, then I will become justice. I will seek out all evil in this world and wipe them out like the clouds in the sky. I swear I will...For justice.
Nanao-chan is last place!
Farewell, warrior of the sky. I pray... you don't forgive me.
No matter how many times I do this, it results in a wonderful reaction from you, Ichigo!
The thing that we call power is dynamic, it keeps on changing.

We are taught never to shed tears. For to shed tears means that the body has been defeated by emotion. And to us, this simple act of crying proves, without question, that the existence of emotion is nothing but a burden.
Justice without a great cause begets nothing more than slaughter. That same slaughter in a great cause...Is Justice.

All creatures want to believe in something bigger than themselves. They cannot live without blind obedience. And to escape the pressure of that trust, those in whom faith is placed in turn look for someone higher than themselves. And then those people in turn look for someone even stronger. That is how all Kings are born. That is how all Gods are born.
GOOD MOOOORNING ICHIGOOOOOO!!!!
Things like protecting the world are no more than moral reasons that sound good.

There is no such thing as "truth" or "lies" in this world; there never has been. There are only plain, hard facts. And yet, all beings who exist in this world acknowledge only those "facts" that are convenient to them, and take them to be the "truth". They do so because they know no other way of living. However, for those powerless beings who comprise the majority of this world's population, inconvenient facts that affirm their very existence, are their only truth.
[To Orihime] Am I frightening... woman?
Exactly when did I say that I do this because I am a shinigami? My killing you is no other reason than the fact that you... Pointed your blade [view shifts to Rukia] at my pride.

Kurosaki Ichigo, you have no chance of defeating me. Even if you somehow manage to defeat me, there will be three more powerful than myself for you to fight. It doesn't matter if you stand up again a thousand times. The road to victory does not exist.
I had no intention of deceiving anyone. It's just that none of you could understand...My true self.

We are all like fireworks. We climb, shine, and always go our separate ways and become further apart. But even if that time comes, let's not disappear like a firework. Let's continue to shine... Forever.
No matter what may happen... As long as you walk by my side... There shall be no enemy that can stand before us.
Who are you again? Sorry, I have a bad memory for ugly faces.
Are you telling me to exploit an opening for the likes of you? Do not speak out of your league, boy.
The arrogant one is you, Espada. But rest at ease. The reason for your loss is not due to that arrogance. It is simply due to a difference in power.
A grenade that's thrown should not come back.
*to Ichigo* I thought you were interesting before, but now you're just a creepy kid.
Flowers are disturbed, god of flowers weeps, winds of Heaven are disturbed, demon of Heaven laughs. Katen Kyōkotsu!
If you give me wings, I will soar for you even if this whole land sinks down to the water. If you give me a sword, I will fight for you even if this whole sky shoots through with your light.

[Urahara writes Ichigo a message in blood] Please meet at Urahara shop immediately. [After Ichigo freaked out] P.S: If you look at this message and think that it is the message of a person before his death... then you have no sense of humor.
"Control"... you say? When you stand before me... that word holds no meaning. Bankai. Senbonzakura Kageyoshi.
We think the flower on the precipice is beautiful, because our fear makes our feet stop at its edge, instead of stepping forward into the sky, like that flower.
It must make you sick to know an underling like me is going to kill you.
Someone get this creature off meeeeeee!
Seele Schneider isn't a sword. [strings the weapon on his bow] A Quincy's only weapons...Are bows and arrows. [fires the Seele Schneider]
It is a thousand years too early... for you to become worthy enough to die by my Bankai.
Howl, Zabimaru.
If one side was just, it would be called a defense or a suppression. But this is war. And wars happen because both sides are just.

Panty And Stocking With Gaterbelt.quote: But that's why I can't let myself be weighed down by fuckin' regrets. A bitch lives as free as a bird that can never be caught.

Psycho-Pass.quote: You sure say some funny things. Solitude? Does that only apply to me? Who isn't alone in this society? The time when our connection to others was the basis of our selves is long gone. In this world where everyone is watched over by the system and live within the system's standards, a community isn't necessary. Everyone just lives in their own cell, and the system tames them by giving them each their own personal serenity.
Everyone is alone. Everyone is empty. People no longer have need of others. You can always find a spare for any replacement. Any relationship can be replaced.
No matter how severe the situation is, if you continue to stay there, you'll accept everything as a everyday life.
I just long for a world in which ordinary things are done in an ordinary way.
I think the only time people really have value is when they act according to their own will.

You can play any character and yet in the end, you yourself are nobody. Your core personality is null. It's empty. That's how you could wear any mask all over your smooth, featureless face and have it fit perfectly.
When a man faces fear, his soul is tested. What he was born to seek... what he was born to achieve... his true nature will become clear.

I was the only one who got an A ranking for the Public Safety Bureau. There were more than 500 students and I was the only one. So I thought that there must have been something that only I could do at the Bureau. If I went there, I thought I could find my purpose in life... I thought I'd be able to find out why I was born here and now!
It is not society that determines people's futures.  It is people who determine society's future.
They say that fools learn from their experiences, while the wise learn from history. I hope you're not a fool.

The law doesn't protect people. People protect the law. People have always detested evil and sought out a righteous way of living. Their feelings, the accumulation of those peoples feelings are the law. They're neither the provisions, nor the system. They're the fragile and irreplaceable feelings that everyone carries in their hearts.
It's not the final judgement of "good" and "evil" that's important. What matters is that you come to that decision yourself. That you agonize over it and eventually accept it.
I love this game that people call "life" from the bottom of my heart.

Shigatsu Wa Kimi No Uso.quote: You're you. "To be like you..." - it's not so ambiguous as that. No matter what you do, no matter how you change, it doesn't mean a thing. you're just you, no matter what.
As a musician, in the process of learning from a teacher, your differences breed a sense of discomfort which you should cherish. It's because of those differences that we have individuality.
Setbacks are inevitable to superstars. Adversity is what separates the good from the great. After all, stars can only shine during the night.
Sure I'm okay. Because that's how I was built, after all.

When you say you "can't hear the sound", doesn't it really mean you "aren't restrained by the sound"? Rather than the sound you hear with your ears, an image inside you is boiling up from the depths of yourself and taking over without you even knowing. The sound inside, the landscape in your heart, your wishes, a sound loaded with your thoughts; didn't you feel it, even for a moment? "Not being able to hear the sound." That is a gift.

We're all connected. Just like the notes are intermittently connected. It's shared by us all. Through music, with the people you know, with the people you don't know, with all the people in this world.

It's not just allies who support each other. From your enemies, you learn so much and gain so much. Until the day you meet again... Just knowing they exist helps you to withstand the loneliness. Those who compete, even if they're enemies, help each other out.

We’re all afraid, you know.. to get up on stage. Maybe you’ll mess up. Maybe they’ll totally reject you. Even so, you grit your teeth and get up on stage anyway. Something compels us… moves us to play music.
Isn't it funny how the most unforgettable scenes can be so trivial ?

By exchanging notes, you get to know one another, to understand one another. As if your souls were connected and your hearts were overlapping. It's a conversation through instruments. A miracle that creates harmony. In that moment, music transcends words.

A lump of steel, like a shooting star. Just seeing the same sky as you makes familiar scenery look different. I swing between hope and despair at your slightest gesture, and my heart starts to play a melody. What kind of feeling is this again? What do they call this kind of feeling? I think it's probably... Called Love. I'm sure this is what they call love.
Even in the depths of the darkest oceans, some light always pierces through.

Utsuro no Hako to Zero no Maria.quote: Life has no weight in itself; it’s a concept created by the observer that does not have a definite form. Essentially, life does not entail multiple instances but is just one massive wobbly lump. However, we tend to refer to the bodies that were formed out of that giant lump as “lives”. The essence of life is in all of us and can’t be “stolen” or “born.” As long as the essence of life exists, life does not decrease or increase, and it certainly won’t disappear.
There’s no despair that can’t be overcome by everyday life.
One can evoke "extraordinary" abilities if one focuses all energy on just one point.
Someone that really can't kill others, has no reason. It is unnatural when you are able to find a reason why you can't kill, and can tell others smoothly.
Do you know why you are making the mistake of sacrificing yourself? It’s because you’re weak. It’s because you can’t face reality.
You can’t cause a change without some courage and determination.
Boredom - there are people that blast their own brain away just to escape from this beast.

Ushinawareta Mirai wo Motomete.quote: The closer you are to someone, the more you have to put things into words to get your feelings across.

Shingeki no Kyojin.quote: I want to see and understand the world outside. I don't want to die inside these walls without knowing what's out there!
There are many ways of thinking as there are people.
Humanity will never stop fighting itself.. until it shrinks to a size of one or fewer.
If there's something you don't understand, learn to understand it.
When people are faced with a situation they don't understand, it's easy for fear to take hold.
I was, I am, and I remain a soldier, sworn to devote my heart and soul to the restoration of humankind! There is no greater glory than than dying for that belief!
If you think reality is just living comfortably and following your own whims, can you seriously dare to call yourself a soldier?
I'll sooner die than become burden.

There are times we can't run away, no matter how bad the odds are. When the people we're supposed to protect are threatened, we have to enter the fray and shield them. And it doesn't matter who or what the enemy is. We need to master skills and get stronger, with artillery as well as hand-do-hand combat. I think that's our responsibility as strong soldiers.
Do you always want to live hiding behind the mask you put up for the sake of others?! You're you, and there's nothing wrong with that.

I haven't lived all that long yet, but there is something I firmly believe in. The people who have the ability to change something in this world, all without exception, have the guts to abandon things important to them if they have to. They are those who can abandon even their humanity.
That's right... This world... is cruel. It hit me that living was like a miracle.
Just because you want other people to think of you as someone who'd literally die for another... dragging someone else to his death just for that... only a bad girl would do that, right?

I don't like the terms "good person" or "bad person" because it's impossible to be entirely good to everyone or entirely bad to everyone. To some, you are a good person, while to others, you are a bad person.
The difference in judgement between you and me, originates from different rules derived from past experience.
Once I'm dead, I won't even be able to remember you. So I'll win, no matter what. I'll live, no matter what!
The strong feed upon weak. It's such an obligingly simple rule. Except in this world, my friends tried to be strong.
If you think it's natural for people to sacrifice their own lives to save others, surely you understand that sometimes a single death can save many lives.
If you don't want to die - think.

Going against the flow... takes a lot of courage. I respect that. Maybe people who can do it are just stupid, but... Well... What I'm sure of is that people like that are rare. So you can't call them common. You can't call them normal, either. People like you... get called special.
You don't stand a single chance to win, unless you fight.
The only thing we're allowed to do... is to believe that we won't regret the choice we made.
We're going to explore the outside world someday, right? Far beyond these walls, there's flaming water, land made of ice, and fields of sand spread wide. It's the world my parents wanted to go to.
I just really don't wanna meet a disappointing end, with someone burning my bones without even knowing who they belonged to.

Mobile Suit Gundam Seed.quote: It seems we have an unforseen problem. A rather annoying fly buzzing around.
Athrun! Show us that same spirit that made you defy orders!
What the hell can you hope to protect when your feelings are the only weapons you've got?
Athrun Zala. Justice. Launching!

Humans can possibly exist without actually having to fight. But, many of us have chosen to fight. For what reason? To protect something? Protect what? Ourselves? The future? If we kill people to protect ourselves and this future, then what sort of future is it, and what will we have become? There is no future for those who have died. And what of those who did the killing? Is happiness to be found in a future that is grasped with blood stained hands? Is that the truth?
One guy's killed for killing another and then he's killed for killing him. How is that kind of twisted thinking ever gonna bring us peace?
But your kindess doesn't come from being a Coordinator... it's because of who you are Mr. Yamato
This is a world where people’s hearts are filled with hatred... where fingers have no purpose other than to pull triggers.
[to Athrun] What is it you believe in? What is it you're fighting for now? Is it for that medal you received? Or your father's orders?

If it's my fate to be shot down by you, I thought this place would be appropriate... However, it doesn't look like there's any chance of that happening. After all, how could the "child" ever hope to defeat the "parent"?
What's so fun about firing at targets that aren't moving?

Aren't you the least bit curious? About the ultimate extent of humanity's insatiable desires? About the fools who pursued their insane dream in the name of progress? Because after all, Kira, you're a child of this too.
There are things people can't accept, even if they do understand them.
Why you little... nobody takes a shot at me!
I can't just quietly follow orders when it looks like all we're trying to do is wipe out every last Natural alive.
Kira... what are you thinking about, now?

No matter what we learn, no matter what we obtain, nothing ever changes! People are amazing that way! They become envious, hate each other, and destroy each other! If that's what they truly desire, why don't they simply exterminate each other!?
If you don’t do something because you think you can’t do it, you’ll never be able to do anything in the future.
People like you walk your paths, believing that something you desire is waiting for you. I walk it to confirm that there is nothing there.
I am the only one who's earned that right in the entire universe! I alone have the right to judge all of humanity!
I knew it. The Earth Forces' new mobile weapons. Father, I knew you'd betray us all!
You kids don't understand anything! By declaring that you're neutral and have nothing to do with this, you can still distance yourselves from what's happening? You don't really believe that, do you?
I may be able to operate the mobile suit... but that doesn't mean I know how to fight a battle!
Using a rescued civilian as a hostage? So do you still feel justified in fighting by their side with these cowards? Kira?
First you must decide, then you must follow through. I believe that’s the only way you can get anything accomplished.

[about Rau] But are you sure that's me? Oh well. He will be my successor in any case. Why should that woman's child be my heir? Keep a close eye on him and educate him well. Whatever you do, don't make him into another weakling.

Shiki.quote: The cold tears of a vampire, whose body is without warmth...
In this world, there are crimes too depraved to ever be forgiven.
No one knows when they will die. Neither you nor I may be able to live that long. But no life is so little as to give up, to think "I don't care when I die."
By the time I noticed, so much time had passed that even my little sister would have died naturally already.
Just like humans, approve killing animals in society, we, approve the killing of humans.

Sword Art Online.quote: You stole this world and it's people. You're a king of thieves, alone upon a stolen throne!
I'd rather trust and regret, than doubt and regret.
No matter what my heart will be forever yours and I will fight until the day I see you again.
Rather than leaving someone to die, I'd much rather die together with them.
If that bullet could also kill a player in the real world, and if you didn't shoot them, you or someone you loved would be killed, could you still pull the trigger?

There's no meaningful difference between a real and a virtual world. It's pointless to ask anyone who they really are. All you can do is accept and believe in them, because whoever they are in your mind, is their true identity.
No point in wondering who someone really is, all you can do is trust them and accept them for who they are. Because the person you come to know is who that person really is.
Just consider hardships as another part of training and keep working hard.
If you married someone, that means you love every side of your significant other that you already know. So if you find a new side after to love, doesn't that mean you'll love your partner even more?
Everybody can fight. It's just a choice of whether you should.
Levels are just numbers. In this world, strength is just an illusion. There are more important things.

Rurouni Kenshin.quote: The dead don't desire revenge, but the happiness of the living.
You will not touch these innocent people with even one inch of your dirty blades, if you require an opponent, I will fight you. If you wanna taste the ground, feel free to attack me.

This era is not so simple that you can put everything on your shoulders and be the only sacrifice. And, at the same time, one person's happiness isn't that simple, either. If you should fall as a sacrifice, one girl who came to Kyoto with the one wish to see you will definitely face misfortune. Remember that. No matter how strong you get, you are just a human being. There is no need for you to either become Buddha, or a murderer.
Hey, I'll have you know that I almost really did kick the bucket during that training, so don't you dare sum it all up in one word, even if it is a nice one like "potential".
Everyone has a past they wish to erase.
In this world, the weak are the sustenance of the strong. The strong live, the weak die.
Once you have a power, sometimes you are put into a situation which make you carry extra burdens, and live all your life with pain.
If fighting could provide us with the truth, nobody would make any mistakes in their lives. A person's life is not that easy. The truth you must learn from yourself, from how you live your life.

The only atonement you will ever realize will be that of you're own death. You will be justly and severely punished, before you ever find the peace you seek Kenshin. That is the meaning of 'Jinchū'. Those who live must act in the place of those who have died. YOU ARE A CRIMINAL SO DIE LIKE ONE! I will make you suffer and scream, you took my sister... You destroyed her happiness... SUFFER KENSHIN, DIE! YOU MISERABLE DOG!!
It is foolish to listen to one who will not listen to you. Do as you wish.
When you are trying to rebuild a build that was made incorrectly, you first have to destroy it. I thought this was the true.
You can train a dog with food. You can buy a person with money. But there isn't a man alive able to influence the wolves of Mibu! Some things will never change. A wolf will always be a wolf.
You can use whatever technique you like, but now that I said I will kill you... your death tonight has been assured.

When I was at the brink of life and death, I used all of my will to survive. I drew upon a different power than that of self-sacrifice and mastered an ultimate technique. The will to live is stronger than anything else. That was the ray of light that my master risked his life to show me. As Hitokiri Battousai, I have committed so many crimes that I cannot possibly repent for them. That is why I had secretly believed that it didn't matter when I died or was killed. However, now... even if I am formally punished or restrained. I will never lose the will to live.
The moment you find the courage to give up your life for someone... Would be the moment you understand love.
Accepting one's own strength, and the strength of others, is an important quality of a swordsman.
The scar of my past will determine my future!
Just because you die... doesn't mean that the people you killed will come back to life... instead using this sword to save just one more soul is repentance in true sense.

Vampire Knight.quote: If it's something I can only cry about in my heart, it's almost like a sin.
I’ve always been alone. The only one that can bring warmth into my life, is you.
Sometimes, forgetting is a type of happiness.

Akame ga KILL!.quote: To kill the one you love... If someone else will do it anyway, I'd rather do it myself.
If you see a girl lookin' unhappy, be a man and help her.
As the survivors, we carry the feelings of those who've passed away on our shoulders.
If a person continues killing, their heart changes into that of a demon without them even noticing.
It's because I loved her the most that I wanted to kill her as swiftly as possible.
Protecting the powerless is simply a soldier's duty!
Everyone has their own reasons to fight! Sometimes, you have to settle it yourself or there's no way forward!
Panicking leads to an early grave.
I have so many things I want to say, so many things I want to ask you, but... When I see your face... None of that matters anymore!

Deadman Wonderland.quote: It doesn't matter whether this world is crazy or not. It doesn't matter if this absurdity is real. It doesn't matter how messed up this place may be... I want to survive.
Life hurts, you think we don't know that? But some of us choose to go on regardless. Some of us don't have time to die cause people count on us to survive.
Being awesome is being nothing but yourself~
Human beings don't feel pain with their bodies. The brain is the thing that transmits the pain to the body.

The always naughty woodpecker. Today, too, you open holes and ruin the forest. The angry wood god turned your beak to poison. Poor woodpecker, your nest has been poisoned. Your food has been poisoned. If you touch your friends, they all die. The sad little woodpecker. Your tears of poison sparkle brightly...
Know what makes Ganta so amazing? He always gets up again.
People fear death because they don't "understand" it, and we're afraid of strangers because we don't "know" them. Not being able to understand the one you love... is the worst fear of all.
Weak humans are sly and irresponsible, they always put the blame on and hurt others.
Facing irrationality doesn't mean not feeling fear, but rather possessing eyes that gaze upon fear and standing against the world.

Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica.quote: You shouldn't want to be like me, I'm... just trying to act cool. No matter how scary it is, how hard it is, I can't talk to anyone about it. I always cry alone. Being a Magical Girl isn't good at all.
You’re too kind. Remember this and take it to heart: kindness sometimes leads to even greater tragedy.
We're fighting for our own wishes. It's normal not to get noticed or remembered.
It sucks, but you can't reach a happy ending just by doing what's right all the time. Actually, the more people get stubborn and insist they're in the right, the further away happiness gets.
If you're just living for your own sake, it's all up to you. No hard feelings. No regrets.
Madoka. My only friend... If... If it's for your sake... I don't mind being locked in this eternal maze!

Rush in there right now and break his hands and legs so he'll never be able to use them again. Make it so he won't be able to do anything without you anymore. Then he'll be yours. His heart, body, everything.
If someone says it's wrong to hope, I will tell them that they're wrong every time. I could tell them that countless times!
Why is it that when humans regret the decision based on a misunderstanding they feel resentment toward the other party?
In our culture, the phenomena known as emotion is considered a mental disorder.

Kuroko No Basket.quote: They say some defeats are meaningful and losing makes you stronger. Do you understand what that means? For living creatures victory is life, and defeat means death. It's an extreme example, but humans retain that instinct. Those who know the terror of defeat, hunger for victory.
We cannot be satisfied until we have eliminated all others. It has nothing to do with reason. It is instinct.
If we give our best in something we love, we'll enjoy the victories from the bottom of our hearts.
Don't go believing everyone with glasses is smart!
Celebrations are more fun if there are more people.
The only lucky item you'll need is already within - CONFIDENCE.

I am a supporting actor, a shadow. But a shadow will become darker if the light is stronger and it will make the white of the light stand out. As the shadow of the main actor, I will make you, the light, the number one in Japan.
Be Yourself because an Original is worth more than a Copy
If you haven't changed, that means you haven't improved.
If we understood how other people felt, then nobody would ever start wars!
Winning is everything in this world. The victors write history. The losers are wiped from it.
The strong don't win. The winners are the strong ones.
I won't say you'll definitely be able to do it if you don't give up. But if you do give up, then there'll definitely be nothing.
Don’t give up! There’s no shame in falling down! True shame is to not stand up again!
There's no such thing as useless effort.

Noragami.quote: You should treat me with awe and wonder!

If you hurt me, then so be it. Do you think that there is any human in all the world who has never hurt another? You are all so kind...It hurts you to hurt others. That is why I had been hiding my pain, as well.

I'm a coward. But I wanted to stay by your side. The truth is I was so happy to hear that you needed me, I took advantage of your words. But you're crying again, because of me. I'm no blessed vessel. I'm just a piece of junk. I was supposed to guide you, but this was the only way I knew how.
You are human, are you not? You are allowed to make mistakes.

Kokoro Connect.quote: You'll discover that problems have a way of working themselves out if you talk to your friends.
What you can't accomplish alone, becomes doable when you're with someone else.
Never forget that kindness can hurt instead of help.
Don’t forget that kindness can hurt people too.

Even if I’m not perfect… Even if I’m not the ideal me… He says that I’m still my own person.
The point of life isn’t to be perfect.
It’s to do want you want to do, to be who you want to be.
That’s how I should be trying to live.
I am who I am now because of everything that's happened. If I try to deny my past, I'm denying the person I've become. I don't want to do that.
