I am who I am now because of my past. Calling any choice I made a mistake would be calling who I am now a mistake.

If you're lonely, you should say something! If you're worried, say something! Most people aren't as sharp as you are! If you want those people to understand you, you should say something! Even if you're worried that you'll embarrass yourself, you should still say something!
If I try to deny my past, I'm denying the person I've become. I don't want to do that.
What defines humans... Defines us? Nobody will notice a change on the inside if you look the same on the outside.

Ao no Exorcist.quote: If you have memories no one else remembers, what's the point in remembering them?
I'm not smart enough to figure out answers no matter how much time I spend thinking. All I can do now is to empty my head and dash forward.
The best way to succeed is to use your own abilities to the fullest.
If you truly have the nerve to feel that way... then you should give yourself up to the order Headquarters, or just die please.
You didn't raise a weapon. You raised a son.
Life's a bitch, so if it's easy, you're doing it wrong.

Fruits Basket.quote: Go ahead! I'll just turn you into the police for assaulting a minor! (To Kyo)
(to Kagura) Sorry that's your cue to say "Shigure you perv" and roll your eyes, slap me, whatever.
Sometimes when I'd go to visit her in the hospital...she would purposely avoid me. Then I didn't know what she was thinking about anymore... (to Yuki, about Rin)
I do love Akito... I love her then... I still do now.
You talk big yet you're nothing but Akito's toy! (To Yuki)
This may have been a useless time for you... but I really wanted to see you!
Waah, Kyo's picking on me! (Repeated line)
I'm gonna take my place as a true member of this family!
I love you!! Even if you go bald or like underage girls, I can handle it! I'm crazy with love!! (Young Kyoko talking to Tohru's fatherher husband)
I never... [chuckles]... laughed this hard in front of my parents.(to Tohru)
NOW, SPARKLE, MY HOUSE OF LEARNING!!
Hippo.

You're afraid to face what you know you must. So instead... you run away. The air that you said was smothering you... you know that it can also heal you. But you refuse to let it. You refuse to let anyone see you for your true self. You're too afraid of what you might lose. You're running away because you're afraid to admit your feelings even to yourself.
DON'T LEAVE ME!!
I'm ho-ome! Yuki-kun, Tohru-kun, I'm home! Oh, and let's not forget stupid-clumsy-Kyo-kun-who-lost-yet-another-fight!
Why don't you stop forcing yourself on him and calling it love? It's painful to watch (to Kagura about Kyo)
How long are you gonna sit in front of me sobbing your little eyes out?! It's depressing! (To Tohru)
With so much at stake... are you willing to take the one in 10,000 chance?
You sicko...I knew you were depraved, but I never imagined how low you could sink! (to shigure)
Sometimes living can be hard! But it's only because we're alive that we can make each other laugh, cry, and be happy!
It's amazing no one's locked you up yet (to Shigure)
I yearn for you more than anyone else. I love you Akito... And that is the irrevocable unwavering truth.(shigures answer to akitos question "do you like me?" during a child hood flashback)
[referring to Tohru] If anyone can find a way to choke on rice, it's her.
I want to believe that life isn't full of darkness. Even if storms come to pass, the sun will shine again. No matter how painful and hard the rain my beat down on me.
A conscience grows, just like the body. It's bred within your heart. That's why the shape of people's kindness is so different.
Tohru, I can't stand not being with you... I... because I love you.
[To Kyo] Perhaps if you'd just die you'd be reincarnated as something more pleasant.
The scariest and the most painful thing is to be hated by someone you truly love.
It would be so great if it was possible to go through life without making a single mistake.
Please stop adding to my misery. (to Ayame)

[To Kyo Sohma]If you think of someone's good qualities as the umeboshi in an onigiri, it's as if their qualities are stuck to their back! People around the world are like onigiri. Everyone has an umeboshi with a different shape and color and flavor. But because it's stuck on their back, they might not be able to see their umeboshi. "There's nothing special about me. I'm just white rice." [in her head] That's not true. There is an umeboshi -- on your back. [aloud] Maybe the reason people get jealous of each other, is because they can see so clearly the umeboshi on other people's backs. I can see them, too. I can see them perfectly. There's an amazing umeboshi on your back, Kyo-kun.
If you don't protect that child, I will never forgive you! (referring to Tohru as she was talking to Kyo on the day of the accident)
Kagura... Regardless of what your reason was, when you played with me...I was happy. Thanks. (To Kagura)

So stupid! Stupid, Stupid! You're so stupid! You want to live your life scared of being ratted out?! Screw that! I'd rather let everyone know everything!! (to Yuki, Tohru, Kyo, and Momiji while destroying a classroom)
It's over between Kana and me. We're not going to get back together. Even if we were together, I would only miss her... (To Shigure and Ayame)
Something this, something that--jeez you're annoying. (to Yuki)

Since when did the "Cat" set the rules for this house? You mean to tell me that you contribute more to this house than anyone else? Do you pay all the bills? I can't stand people who do absolutely nothing but complain all the time! (To Kyo)
One more word Shigure and the entire publishing industry will know every embarrassing thing you've done since you were four.
You're trying to break the curse. Stop it. What are you trying to do? Do you look down on us? Do you pity our wretched state? Don't bother! We never asked for your sympathy! (To Tohru)

Ah, I'm sorry, I guess this is farewell. Let Tohru find happiness. Please by many people let her be loved. If you become perplexed or make errors, in the end have the kind of life that you can have pride in living. The kind where you can say, "I persevered". Repeating delightful things and sad things. And in that way keep getting older. I persevered. (Part of Kyoko's last words that were never said)

It would be nice to live in a kind world without any fear, without any troubles, without hurting anybody, without ever being hurt; only doing the right thing. I wish I could reach this kind world by the shortest path possible.
You reject your femininity... yet at the end here you are using it.
[On first seeing Kyo] The ceiling... Is he hurt...? Wh-who... Well, hello, orange-head...
(thinking) I want Haru. I want all of him.

Strangely enough, when you get older, the things you didn't understand when you were a child... start to make sense. "When this happened, I should have done that." "When that happened, I should have said this." Those types of things. You start to understand rather than regret. It may be closer to repentance. So it may be that I do want to repent and erase the ignorant self from my childhood. Maybe that's what they mean when they say adults are selfish.

If I were to live out life without any mistakes that would be great. But... there is no such path. Falling, tripping, losing the way, making mistakes, little by little, walking one step at a time, this is the only way to live out life.
High school girls, high school girls, all for me, high school girls!

[To Ritsu Sohma] I'm sure that inside your heart...you're trying with all your might to find it on your own...the reason you were born. Because...because really...there might not be anyone who was born with a reason. I think that everyone might have to find one on their own. [in her head] A reason for being born... A reason that it's okay to be alive... A reason to exist. [aloud] I think everyone might have to find it themselves...and decide for themselves. It could be your dreams...your job...or a person. ...The reason you're looking for...might be vague, unclear...and uncertain. [in her head] And you might lose it. [aloud] But as long as you're alive...you have to keep searching for that reason.
Kyo-kun! Kyo-kun! I do love you, Kyo-kun! I love you!!!
A bond may seem like a beautiful thing from the outside...but if those involved see it as a burden, it's nothing but a shackle.
It's true, crying unexpectedly does make you feel better. When you're an adult you forget that.
Leave her out of this... who we let in this house is really none of your concern. You're the one who doesn't belong here. (to Kyo)
I don't need you anymore. I'm tired of you. (To Haru)

Pain, suffering. It's pointless to just think about those things. The traveler (referring to "The Most Foolish Traveler" by Natsuki Takaya) didn't. That may be stupid to some people but that's not stupid to me. Yuki... Kyo... when you close your eyes, what do you think?
...If Tohru-chan were to die, I...I wonder if I'd be able to smile again one year later? Or if I'd wish that I could forget ever having met her. ...Tohru-chan... has tried really hard...
Thanks for such a boring time, it was a blast!

Shut up. Quit shouting like you're king of the figgin' world. You're making my ears bleed you bastard. Now I've got some common sense for you... If I wore a tie, it wouldn't change who I am. If I had no piercings, it wouldn't mean I'm nice and if my hair wasn't black, it wouldn't stop me from kicking your ass! Who do you think you are anyway? You think you're God huh?! What's the matter?! Run out of things to say? No more advice?! You're not so hot anymore right now are you?! (Black Haru yelling at student council president for shouting at Momiji)
[After seeing Yuki, Shigure, and Kyo Sohma transform for the first time] THEY'RE ALL ANIMALS!

Yahari Ore No Seishun Love Come Wa Machi.quote: Helping someone out is not a justifiable reason for you to get hurt.
Isn't changing yourself the same as running away? Why can't you just accept who you are?
If you can't get along without putting someone else down, it can't be real friendship.
Guys are simple creatures. Just by talking to them, they get the wrong idea.

Do you know the phrase “enough specks of dust creates a mountain”? Or maybe “three heads are better than one.” In other words, when people gathered together, they become even stronger and more secure. However, we were a group of failures who had gathered to do pointless things.

I hate nice girls. Just exchanging greetings with them will get them on your mind. Start texting each other, and your heart will be set a flutter. If they call you, you're done for. Enjoy staring at your logs and grinning like a fool. However, I won't get fooled again. That's what your kind calls kindness. If you're nice to me, you're nice to others. I always end up nearly forgetting that. Reality is cruel, so I'm sure lies are a form of kindness. Thus, I say kindness itself is also a lie. I always ended up with these expectations. And I always ended up with these misunderstandings. And before I knew it, I stopped hoping. A highly trained loner is once bitten, twice shy. As a veteran on this battlefield of life, I've gotten used to losing. That's why I always hate nice girls.

"The important thing is to take part." Famous words spoken by Pierre de Frédy, Baron de Coubertin during a speech. However, this quote tends to be frequently misused and serves as kind of a threat to force participation. There are tons of wild-goose chases in this world, y'know. If the most important thing is to take part, then surely one could find meaning in not taking part as well. And if everything's worth experiencing, then there's little doubt that the feeling of not experiencing something is, in itself, worth experiencing. In fact, you could even call it a valuable experience to not experience something everyone else does.

Trying to not hurt others is something you can’t do. People are creatures who hurt others just by existing even if they’re not aware of it. Whether you’re living or dying, you’ll always be hurting someone. Once you’re involved, you’ll hurt someone, and even by not being involved, you might be hurting someone else as well…
People who grow up in different environments will invariably have different tastes and preferences. Therefore, could one say that the subsequent marriages necessarily lead to happiness?

There's probably no one who's more of a realist than the unpopular loner. I have lived my life with the Three Nevers of the Unpopular: Never to hold (hope), Never to open (your heart), and Never to treasure (sweet words).
I like myself. I have never once hated myself. My high specs, my half-decent looks, my pessimistic, realist point of view... I don't hate any of it at all.
We reset, and return to our separate lives. You can't reset your life, but you can reset your relationships.
People who don't work hard don't have the right to be envious of the people with talent. People fail because they don't understand the hard work necessary to be successful.
Youth is both a lie and a form of evil.
Just as stand users attract other stand users, loners seems to have an ability to attract other loners as well.
Walls are an unavoidable part of youth.

About marriage or about future, I don't know what will happen in the future. In this world, it's normal that when there's a preparation, then a new grief is born, but everyone has the right to desire happiness. Our efforts need to be held for the sake of our future.
Aside from the fact that I don't have any friends or girlfriends, I'm still a high quality product!

Marriage, the institution where one's existence goes to die. All married people prattle on about their so-called marital bliss about how they love saying "I'm home!" to their spouses, or how seeing their sleeping kids motivates them for tomorrow. But think about it: you can say "I'm home!" if you live your parents, you can even buy some mouthwash and say "I'm home!" to the hippos on the label. And if they're talking about seeing their sleeping kids, that just means they're working hellish overtime hours. How is that in any way blissful?
Fake people have an image to maintain. Real people just don't care.

The concept of lateness being evil is wrong in the first place... The police don't mobilize until after an accident happens, and it's standard for heroes to show up late. But would anyone condemn them for being late? So, speaking paradoxically, lateness is justice.
You should realize that there are people whose hearts break each time they see you hurt yourself.
Working hard alone doesn't assure you that you'll achieve your dreams. Actually there are more cases where you don't. Even so, working hard and achieving something is some consolation at least.

Another.quote: Talent is a key factor, of course, but without some luck on your side you're likely to fail.
It doesn't do any good to pretend you can't see what's going on.
But if that’s what you want to do, you might as well try. It’s just pathetic to give up on something before you even give it a shot.
How does it feel to not exist?

Vinland Saga.quote: You're young. Time is on your side. You'll grow up and I'll grow old. Someday you'll likely beat me. It's only natural. Even the strongest man must die.
Well, if they're dead, then that's the end of it. Crying about it gets you nothing but an empty stomach
I'd had fifteen years to think about him. And I realized that it wasn't a matter of the life or death of flesh. What's important to a warrior is the soul...And where it lies.

Where in this world can a sane man be found? We're the same. We're all the same. None of us understands what it means to love all. Or the meaning of life...Or the meaning of death...Or the meaning of our own battles.
The only reason I must rely on this sword is because I am imperfect. A true warrior...Needs no sword

Summer Wars.quote: There's no lack of painful things in this world, but hunger and loneliness must surely be two of the worst. Thanks to you, I didn't know a moment of either of them.

Kimi ni Todoke.quote: The longer you're with someone, the tougher it is to part ways.
It was like you brought color to my life. You changed my life, all by yourself.

Tokyo Ghoul.quote: I was wrong. I wasn't eating ghouls. I'm the one who was being eaten.

Books are nice, aren't they? With just one sentence you can get lost in all sorts of dreams. They way I think of it, literature allows the reader's consciousness to deeply relish the author and be closer to him. And so, we freely walk around the world of the story from the yarn spinner's point of view. It's only when you immerse yourself in the world of a book that you are able to forget just who you are.
We're always trying to justify our actions with ideals. But ideals cannot give grounds for killing another person. The act of taking a life will always be considered... evil.
As my fingers and toes re-grew like fingernails or hair over and over and over and over... and over again, every single time I got the feeling that I truly, truly truly was a monster.
Never trust anyone too much, remember the devil was once an angel.
There are times when you have to give up on one thing to preserve the other. Your mother couldn't. That isn't kindness. That's just being weak.
If you were to write a story with me in the lead role, it would certainly be... a tragedy.
Why is it that the beautiful things are entwined more deeply with death than with life?
All of the disadvantage in this world stems from a person's lack of ability.
There's no way someone who can't even protect himself can protect anyone else, is there?
I'm begging you, don't make me a killer!

You're wrong. It's not the world that's messed up; it's those of us in it. Yes, some ghouls walk a path that leaves sorrow in their wake, but just like humans, we can choose a different path altogether. We have a lot to learn, both your kind and mine. We need to stop fighting, and start talking. Because when it comes to the state of the world, you can't point your finger at ghouls or humans. We're all to blame.
The bird fights it's way out of the egg. The egg is the world. Who would be born, must first destroy a world.
After you've gobbled him down you'd be left alone to regret it while covered in blood and guts. That's the hunger of a ghoul. That's our destiny.
If an angelic being fell from the sky and tried to live in this world of ours, I think even they would commit many wrongs.
It's better to be hurt than to hurt others. Nice people can be happy with just that.

Spirited Away.quote: Three days of eating our food and her smell will go away. And if she doesn't work hard, roast her, boil her, do whatever you want. Now get back to work!
[To Yubaba] I'm not leaving until you give me a job!
[To Chihiro as she's sleeping] Meet me at the bridge. Come alone.

Zetsuen No Tempest.quote: The beginning is the end, and the end is the beginning. Well then, let us begin again. And to each, their own tale.
We don't know if this world is real or a dream. Maybe the world until now has been a convenient fake. But magic will probably disappear now. The dream is over.
Rumors, at times, can be more severe than the truth.
What exactly would change if I wanted revenge, was consumed by hatred, or went insane with rage?
What's wrong with wanting to keep the man you love out of harm's way?

Everything happens for a reason. The daily tragedies and misfortunes are all meaningful events, leading toward an ideal conclusion. With that in mind, there probably isn't really any meaningless misfortune.
I won't live my life by another person's script.
Tomorrow's promise will never come. I wonder how many of tomorrow's promises have disappeared as though they have never existed.
There are no convenient miracles, and there is logic that should be inviolable.
How much weight can a simple promise carry?
Even if he hates me, being able to die with the knowledge that the one I love will never forget me… there is no greater happiness a woman could desire.

To you, life was just something you acted out and ended, all according to someone else's script. That's why you were always quoting Shakespeare. However, Aika, I say that you were wrong! You did what you shouldn't have, and didn't do as you should have. Because you relied on someone else's script, you were wrong. I won't live my life by another person's script. Not by Hamlet or The Tempest. I don't know how many years in the future it will be... but I'll write and act my own ending.
The subtle light that is born when people's feelings come together. That light embraces felicity, evil, sin, and happiness. The light blazes forth... illuminating the whole truth.
To lose the woman you loved, not even being able to grieve… if not a tragedy, what is it?
It might be for the better if there are amusing people around me. Because any tragedy may seem a comedy, as long as I am with them.
It's not over yet. If we don't end it, nothing can start. Even if nothing at all begins, we must still put an end to it.
In this crazy-ass world, there's no point in playing the blame game.

Psycho-Pass Extended Edition.quote: People's thoughts, wishes, hopes and desires... We live in a time where technology can read everything in your mind, and yet, this place teems with people who hate, lie, steal and try to harm others. If that's not irrational, then what is it?

Clausewitz, he pointed out that no matter how carefully one plans, on the battlefield, even the smallest of details can cause setbacks. Regardless of how well-thought it is, armchair strategizing only works in the realm of theory. Unexpected troubles, or uncontrollable factors such as weather. Operations face those sorts of troubles. They are the cause of strife on the battlefield.

Suppose someone said "humans are foolish"... Obviously, that person would be talking about themselves as well. If you want to understand human beings, you need to do more than just watch them. You need to pay attention to what they themselves are watching. What are you watching? You are the ones who I'm watching. It may be hard to believe, but I like you guys. You know what they say... The opposite of love is not hatred, but indifference. An indifferent person would lack the drive to kill or hurt. My mind keeps jumping around. Am I nervous...? Did I underestimate my enemy so much that I stepped in too deep...? ...What a silly thought.

Danganronpa: Kibou No Gakuen To Zetsubou.quote: I came to realize something. Parenthesis are amazing! No matter how negative something sounds, if you throw "LOL" in some parentheses behind it - it becomes positive!
A hint is one thing, but simply sharing the answer it leads to is dangerous.
Fear is proof that your imagination is functioning. Frankly, I feel bad for anyone who can't feel fear. Without imagination, you can never deduce which action to take next.
Wherever there is hope, there is most definitely despair.
Disrupt law and order, and you get punished for it. Isn't that how society works?
It is not the strong or the smart that survive, but the ones who can bring about change.
So everyone just pretends to understand... and pretends to be understood.
Also, the "fear" experience is a little different from yours, I imagine. You're afraid of what you might lose, right? But I'm afraid of what I've already lost.
Despair is contagious. Everyone catches it.
If you make light of other people's emotions, it will surely come back to bite you.
There is no greater accomplishment in life than pushing yourself to the limit, always! Isn’t that so? That’s all there is to it!

Hellsing.quote: Little Hellsing chicky, I'm coming to find you. Come out and play, little Hellsing. It's going to be a lot of fun. We just want to torture you, kill you, maybe skullfuck your corpse a couple of times, burn your house to the ground, go home, and masturbate, okay?

And while you're waiting for us to kill you, we highly recommend p!$$!ng yourself, Followed by a course of praying to your impudent god. And cowarding in the corner and begging, always good. But if you act now, there's still time for an old-fashioned suicide!! Thank you London! We love you! Goodnight!
Resignation is what kills people. Once they've rejected resignation, humans gain the privilege of making humanity their footpath.
Such a shame. I overestimated you. As a vampire, you were just a pathetic piece of shit. And now you're nothing but dog shit!
Immortality is wasted on the young.
These monsters dare to enter this house built on blood and honor! I will see them all roast in the deepest pits of Hell!

Look well at Integra’s “battle”, Police girl! Integra cut herself open, shed her own blood… and chose to fight for her life. Giving up kills people. When people reject giving up… they finally win the right to transcend humanity. “Never give up, even if it means death”… that is the pride and dignity of our 
master.

No, you’re the maggot underneath the garbage! Look at you! That cheap outfit isn’t even fit for a carnival. What do you think you’re doing? Wearing a priest outfit, you don’t even know the meaning of shame. That’s what makes you trash! You’re a narrow-minded king… who creates a host of ghouls to keep as slaves. You’re a coward incapable of acting on your own. Even Hell wouldn’t accept you! Your instant vampires are cockroaches! Multiplying everywhere before you know it. I can’t stand your kind… half-ass vampire without the slightest bit of self-respect! You don’t even know what you are! By the 
way…  I have my reasons for serving humans. But of course, it’s not a story for trash like you.
Eternity is wasted upon the likes of you. Try as you might, immortality slips away. And you remain with only your shame.

Sakamoto desu ga?.quote: Accomplishing a shared goal under tense circumstances causes distance between people to naturally close.
Even if they're only a year older, shouldn't we respect and serve our elders?
Looking back on the past is a dangerous thing. It's nothing more than an attachment.
If I have to win through underhanded means, I'd rather just stand right here until I die.

When faced with a decision... At such times, we must choose only one option and it can be very confusing. When that happens, simply using your head and charging straight into the obstacle is a fine option.
Have a dream that you can achieve within your lifetime!
If you have no money, I believe all you can do is work.

When you aim to reach high places, you may find yourself on narrow footing and feel disheartened. And then your confidence will falter, and you will find it ever harder to believe in yourself. If you ever feel that you can't believe in yourself, please believe in your friends.

Death Note.quote: Actually, if you're smart, you can eat sweets without gaining weight.

That may be so. What is right from wrong? What is good from evil? Nobody can truly distinguish between them. Even if there was a god. Now, supposing a god and his world existed, even then I'd stop and think for myself. I'd decide for myself whether his teachings are right or wrong. After all, I am just the same as you. I put faith in my own convictions as to what I believe is right, and consider them to be righteous.
*after Misa-chan says that she can't imagine a world without Light* Hmmm... Yes, it would be dark!

It's not a sense of justice. Figuring out difficult cases is my hobby. If you measured good and evil deeds by current laws, I would be responsible for many crimes. The same way you all like to solve mysteries and riddles, or clear video games more quickly. For me too, it's simply prolonging something I enjoy doing. That's why I only take on cases that pique my interest. It's not justice at all. And if it means being able to clear a case, I don't play fair, I'm a dishonest, cheating human being who hates losing.

Careful what you do, cuz "God" is watching your every move. Hold my hand in the dark street, for if you do I know that I'll.. be safe. Even if I'm far away and alone, I can be sure that you'll find me there, this I know. You told me close for a while, so quite. You tell me everything. If I forget what to say then you'll come to me and tell me again, yes you'd tell me once again. But what happens when I know it all and what should I do, after that, what then?
I must protect my fledging Utopia.
It was the only way the world had to be fixed! A purpose, given to me!
You let them take it from right under your nose.
I have a mind of a genius and a strong sense of justice.
Matt... I never thought you'd be killed... I'm sorry.
The human world is a boring place with boring people doing boring things.
That was worth an academy award, Light.
Why are you staring at me? Are you annoyed that I am the only one who has cake?
I am Light's girlfriend from university.
You, who've taken on his name, have managed – well, nothing.
It's not whether it's feasible or not – it's what I'm doing.
Humans aren't made perfectly. Everyone lies. Even so... I've been careful not to tell lies that hurt others.
Things are getting interesting now.
I've won. Exactly as planned.
I've never considered finding that notebook and gaining that power a misfortune.
If you keep my secret, this strawberry is yours.
You said she's smart, but it only means she got high marks, and she's actually a stupid woman.
I don't care if it is fortunate or unfortunate that Light picked up the Death Note. However... It is generally bad luck for a person to be followed by a God of Death.
I can't develop feelings. That's how most idiots screw up.
That's right, I am Kira. And what can you do? Kill me right here?
I feel like I'm watching a sitcom.
Sometimes, the questions are complicated - and the answers are simple.
This isn't divine jugdement. It's the work of some childish killer who's playing at divine retribution. That's all.
I've wanted to make him taste his own pathetic failure with all my heart.

Under normal circumstances, humans should have continued to evolve as the greatest creatures upon this earth, but we were actually regressing. A rotten world. Politics, law, education... Was there anybody around who could correct this world? But someone had to do it.
If I sit like a normal person my investigative abilities are only working at 50% efficiency.
I am Justice! I protect the innocent and those who fear evil. I'm the one that will become the god of a new world that every one desires!
Risking your life and doing something that could easily rob you of your life are exact opposites.

I understood that killing people was a crime. There was no other way! The world had to be fixed! A purpose given to me! Only I could do it. Who else could have done it, and come this far? Would they have kept going? The only one who can create a new world is me.
Let's value our lives.
Unless someone makes the first move, nothing will happen.

Avatar: The Last Airbender.quote: Hmm... *puts on a happy face* Delectable tea... *changes to serious face* or deadly poison?..
I know you're not supposed to cry over spilled tea, but (sniffs) it's just so sad!
You call it dirt. I call it a healthy coating of earth.
Chakras, chakras, everybody loves chakras! Chakras, chakras! Chakra sandwich tastes good! Yum!
If I had been more decisive, and acted sooner, I could have stopped Sozin, and stopped the war before it started. I offer you this wisdom, Aang, you must be decisive.
Look what I found! These are packue berries, known to cure the poison of the white jade plant... THAT, or makaoli berries that cause blindness.

My grandmother used to tell me stories about the old days, a time of peace when the Avatar kept balance between the Water Tribes, Earth Kingdom, Fire Nation, and Air Nomads. But that all changed when the Fire Nation attacked. Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, only he could stop the ruthless firebenders. But when the world needed him most, he vanished. A hundred years have passed and the Fire Nation is nearing victory in the war. Two years ago, my father and the men of my tribe journeyed to the Earth Kingdom to help fight against the Fire Nation, leaving me and my brother to look after our tribe. Some people believe that the Avatar was never reborn into the Air Nomads and that the cycle is broken, but I haven't lost hope. I still believe that somehow...the Avatar will return to save the world.
There's an airbender in our presence and not just any airbender, the Avatar! Now what do you have to say for yourself, Mr. Pipinpadaloxicopolis?!

With Roku gone and the Great Comet returning, the timing was perfect to change the world. I knew the next Avatar would be born an Air Nomad so I wiped out the Air Temples, but somehow the new Avatar eluded me. I wasted the remainder of my life searching in vain. I know he's hiding out there somewhere: the Fire Nation's greatest threat, the last Airbender.
I know I am not the person you expected...and I did not expect to be licked by a giant tongue just now.
Don't you know that fans only make flames stronger?
Zuko's gone crazy! I made a sand sculpture of Suki and he destroyed it! ... Oh, and he's attacking Aang.
You may not always see the light at the end of the tunnel, but if you keep moving, you will come to a better place.
I've seen enough of Ba Sing Sei. And I can't even see!
If I try, I fail. If i don't try i'm never going to get it.
You make a fine octopus, Pupil Aang.
Yesterday my mouth tasted like mud. Now it tastes like sand. I never thought I would miss the taste of mud so much.

Earthbenders! You don't know me, but I know of you. Every child of my water tribe village was rocked to sleep with stories of the brave Earth Kingdom and the courageous earthbenders who guard its borders. Some of you may think that the Fire Nation has made you powerless. Yes, they have taken away your ability to bend, but they can't take away your courage and it is your courage they should truly fear! Because it runs deeper than any mine you've been forced to dig, any ocean that keeps you far from home. It is the strength of your hearts that make you who you are, hearts that will remain unbroken when all rock and stone has eroded away. The time to fight back is now! I can tell you the Avatar has returned! So remember your courage, earthbenders, let us fight for our freedom!
*to Aang* You need to find someone who WAITS and LISTENS before striking.
[Ty Lee unleashes a furry of jabs into the back of a Kyoshi warrior, dropping her, and unleashes a final taunt] You are not prettier than we are.
*to Zuko* You know, father blames uncle for the loss of north pole... and he considers YOU a miserable failure for not finding the avatar.
*after meeting Aang for the first time* Good news for the Fire Lord. The nation's greatest threat is just a little kid.

Water brings healing and life. But fire brings only destruction and pain. It forces those of us burdened with its care to walk a razor's edge between humanity and savagery. Eventually, we are torn apart.
Or, as they say in the Fire Nation, "stay flamin'!"
*to Aang* Protection and power are overrated. I think you are very wise to choose happiness and love.
[to himself as he chops at the ice] I'm just a guy with a boomerang. I didn't ask for all this flying and magic.
Mighty Katara..? I like that.
*talking about King Bumi* This isn't about finding a teacher. This is about finding my friend.
All right! Team Avatar is back! Air, water, earth, fire- (grabs a bunch of leaves) fan, and sword! (his leaf limps)
Looks like Long Feng is long gone! (laughs) Oh, I've been waiting to use that one!
No! Bad Fire Nation baby!
[to Katara] Come... closer... closer... Will you go penguin sledding with me?
Life happens wherever you are, whether you make it or not.
Never forget who you are, for surely the world won't.

*referring to the man that took her mothers life* I wanted to do it. I wanted to take out all my anger at him. But... I couldn't. I don't know if it's because I'm too weak to do it, or if it's because I'm strong enough not to.
Nice speech, Azula! It was pretty and poetic, but also scary in a good way!
Uh, Toph, I think your feet need their eyes checked.

In the avatar state... You're at your most powerful, but you're also...at your most vulnerable. If you're killed in the avatar state, the reincarnation cycle will be broken and the avatar will cease to exist.
Love is brightest in the dark.
Somebody's a little light on his feet. What's your fighting name, the Fancy Dancer?
[sarcastically] In my country, we exchange a pleasant "hello" before asking questions.
You must look within yourself to save yourself from your other self. Only then will your true self reveal itself.
This whole Avatar thing... maybe the monks made a mistake.
[to Zuko about Aang] It was not by chance that for generations people have been searching for him, and now you have found him.

CLANNAD.quote: No matter how cold and distant people may become, on the inside something warm and precious always remains, something that never changes. To me, that’s what family is like.

If you feel like crying you should not hold back your tears. You should let it all out while you still can - because when you get bigger sometimes you can't cry even if you have something to cry about.
Isn’t there something strange in becoming friends because you’re asked? Friends aren’t given; you’re supposed to make them.
Love is like a firework from the past... it's more beautiful for it to go to pieces and scatter far off.

At a place where you feel most restful… Next to the person you find most dear. People's lives are repetitions of inflicting pain on each other. It's understandable to doubt others. But being unable to trust anything is the same as being unable to feel other people's love. Aren’t you, perhaps, feeling lonely? Aren’t you, perhaps, living slavishly? Are you able to laugh with an honest heart?
Isn’t it fine as long as you find it? Isn’t it fine as long as you find the next fun and happy moments again?
What are you so hesitant about? It’s your dream, isn’t it? It’s right in front of you and you’re wavering? You gotta be reckless, and take whatever you can!
Being unable to trust anything is the same as being unable to sense other people's love.
If you get all worked up yourself, you’ll always get someone who’ll rebel. Being too eager brings negative results.
You're trying to stay unscarred, aren't you? If you've come this far, you'll have to hurt someone. The more time you take to decide, the deeper and more it'll hurt. For all of you.
You are who you are. You have to do what you can.
It’s natural that men have things they need to protect.
Sanae-san told me, places that I can cry are in a toilet, or in daddy's arms.

If a prediction is right, then it's like you only have one future. Like that future has been decided. But if it's wrong, then you have an almost infinite number of possibilities. And that means that even the tiniest twist of fate can change your future. I want to believe that I have choices - that the path I walk has many different turns, and many different roads to follow!

Aria the Animation.quote: If one feels it is fun now, one will be able to enjoy life the most. Everything will change over time, so we must treasure the happy moments before us.
Mysterious things, when you were a child you used to think "They exist for sure!", but all of a sudden it changes to, "It would be nice if they existed." I wonder when and why you stop believing.

Have you heard this story before? When a certain traveler left on a journey in search of what he desired, he was told by his teacher: "You mustn't lose your way, because if you make one wrong turn - you will never find what you were searching for". But, unfortunately, the traveler lost his way and hung his head in dismay... But when he raised his head again, what he saw before him was a world even more magnificent than what the traveler was searching for. It means if you don't make mistakes, there are things you won't discover.

Eureka Seven.quote: I'm still very very young. I want to go shopping, and I want to eats lots more of all kinds of yummy foods, you know? And of course... Of course... have a wonderful romance too. If I could have something like that, it would be the best. Yeah... That really would be the best.
Don't worry about being so considerate of adults. You can only be a kid for so long, so you might as well enjoy it.
Don't beg for it, earn it. Do it, and you'll be rewarded.
Never beg and earn by winning or else you won't get anything.
Freedom is something you have to fight for, rather than something you're given. Being free means being prepared to carry that burden.
If you don't believe in anything, it no longer has the power to hurt.

Dice: The Cube That Changes Everything.quote: Huh? DO whatever you want without DICE? As if someone like you could understand. What's so bad about wanting to reach higher than yourself? After all, you're already up there. The place where I've always longed to be. If anything, isn't this world at fault? There's plenty of proof this world was created unfairly. The Crime rate's higher than ever. Wealth is the determining factor in life, and so when the most prestigious universities held an experiment, "Does appearance affect the outcome in a trail?" When comparing the results of the beautiful and the plain, the beautiful ones were declared innocent more often. Looks decide your worth. LOOKS, SEX, AGE, ETHNICITY, EDUCATION, JOB, once you realize that there will always be a 'High' and 'Low", the goal is clear. Higher... and Higher! I'm sure that looking down from the highest place will be beautiful sight, so I must reach higher!
Haven't you ever thought that life would be better if it was a game?

No Game No Life.quote: Throughout all of history, no wise king has ever forced his army to obey him through oppression. People will only truly fight for what is right. And there is only one thing that is truly right in this world! The one true, unchanging righteousness in the world is... cuteness! Cute makes right! All our needs, desires, and instincts seek cuteness, and it is for cuteness that we will give everything we have! That's just the way men are!

They say people can change, but is that really true? If they decide they want to fly, will they grow wings? I don't think so. You don't change yourself, you change how you do things. You have to make your own way. You have to create a way to fly, even while you stay the same.
There is more than one way to win a game. You can win without fighting!
An idiot that knows he's an idiot, is even harder to deal with than an idiot that thinks he isn't.
I can conquer the world with one hand as long as you are Holding the other
A temporary defeat is nothing if it leads to ultimate victory!

There is no such thing as luck in this world. Rules, prerequisites, psychological states... There are any number of invisible factors that combine to produce an unpredictable, but inevitable result. The winner of each game is decided before it even begins. Chance is never a factor.
In fairy tales, when the protagonists end up in a different world, they do their best to get back home, right? But who would want to go back to a world like that?
"Checkmate" doesn't mean you've simply cornered the enemy king. It's a declaration that the enemy king is yours. That's why I said it the first time I met you. "Checkmate."

Because of our weakness, we trained our eyes, ears and the ability to think. Learning how to survive, that's our trait as humans! The human species can't use magic and can't even perceive it—but because we are weak, we have the wisdom to run away from magic and the intelligence to see through it! We don't have any extraordinary senses. But because we are weak, by learning and gaining experience, we gained the wisdom to achieve the unachievable—to predict the future...Rejoice! We are humans; we are the most talented people! Precisely because we were born without any ability, we can achieve anything. This is the will of the weakest race!
This blank space represents infinite potential. One day, it may become anything.

Oppression. Rule by fear. dictatorships. It's a strange thing. Throughout history, for some reason, the lives of such rulers have always ended in the same way: Assassination by someone who isn't even part of a combat unit.
We do not stop playing games because we grow old, we grow old because we stop playing.

Great Teacher Onizuka.quote: Give a kid a smoke and he'll be happy for a day. Teach him how to smoke... he'll be happy for his whole shortened life.

You know, when I was in high school, I was a troublemaker. I hardly went to school. Before I knew it, I was expelled. When I couldn't go anymore, was when I first realized, that school was a great thing. There's a lot of friends and lots of fun things. When I got this old, I wanted even more to go to school. That's why I became a teacher. Because, if I become a teacher, I could stay in school until I die, right? That's why I'm really happy now. I want you to be like that too. I want you to like school. Once it's over, it's too late.
We cannot go back to the past, no matter how hard we try. No matter how wonderful it was. The past is nothing but the past.
[Onizuka's p*nis is bit by a snake]Someone. Suck the poison out! ...Fuyutsuki-chan! I beg you! Suck it out quickly!
Sometimes violence is the only way to get the message across.

Himouto! Umaru-chan.quote: You never appreciate the irreplaceable things in life until they're gone. Like summer vacation... or brothers.

Golden Time.quote: I don’t want to waste a single second or meter. From your first step and second of the day, I want to be with you.
Once you miss the opportunity to say something, the words become increasingly toxic. The best thing to do is to just say everything.
When you want to scream or cry, I’ll be there. I’ll share your feelings and stay with you.

Tokyo Ghoul:re.quote: The sorrows of life...To not be able to live like yourself. The joys of life...To be able to die like yourself.

Dragon Ball Z.quote: I start wars, resolve them myself, then I buy up the war ravaged lands for a low prince and make a killing off redevelopment and reconstruction concessions!It is a brilliant scheme.
I’ll never give in to you circus freaks!
Well, I wonder what the prince would do if he knew, you authorized Planet Vegeta’s destruction from the start?
There are three things I cannot tolerate: cowardice, bad haircuts, and military insurrection. It is very unfortunate that our friend Vegeta possesses all three of these.
How could I let this happen to my son? He has sacrificed everything for me! And I have done nothing but ignore him!
If I win, promise you won’t destroy the earth.
I do not fear this new challenge, rather like a true warrior I will rise to meet it.
While I’m here wasting time, how hard is Kakarot training?
You failed to protect your planet, because of your own leniency. The only way to avoid this outcome is to send Frieza back to his flower garden.
I could go one step farther If I wanted to.

You will not go in there with hopes of winning the tournament the first time you compete. To do so would be arrogant! And arrogance is for fools, not warriors! So you will enter the tournament with the sole purpose of improving your fighting skills.

*To Android 19* Just as I thought... you're nothing. Silly robot, you really think you have a chance against a super saiyan like me? Your brain must be malfunctioning. Fresh out of the factory with no warranty and already broken. What a pity.
There’s no such thing as fair or unfair in battle. There is only victory or in your case, defeat.
The ocean is so salty because everyone pees in it.

Where is your honor!? Like all pure-blooded Saiyans, Kakarot would rather die fighting than win with one of those disgraceful senzu beans as his crutch! Kakarot trained in the hyperbolic time chamber just as we did! Now let’s see what he can do!
My ears do more than just frame my face.
Power comes in response to a need, not a desire. You have to create that need.

He has beaten me completely. First by his own actions and then through his son’s. And what has he left for me here? How? How could you die like that? How, Kakarot? I’ll never have the chance…to prove my strength against you. You died without fear. What does that make of me? I am no warrior. And I will never fight again.

Fukushuu Kyoushitsu.quote: It just so happens that I was caught in a web. A web known as malice. Whether you put up with it, or put up a fight, it makes no difference. In the end, you get killed. If you don't like that... risk your life... and retaliate.

Fate/stay night.quote: Atone for my sins? [...] I have no sins to atone for, nor have I forced such a meaningless concept on anyone.
...Yes, the desire to protect something... is, at the same time, none other than the wish for something to violate it.
I envy you people. What I sought, but could not obtain. What I obtained, but could not obtain. Many things slipped out between my fingers, no matter what commandment I used.
But that's enough. If there is overwhelming power and speed, there is no room for technique. Techniques are something humans invented to compensate for their weaknesses.

An ideal is only an ideal after all. As long as you embrace that ideal, the friction with reality will continue to increase. So you will someday face reality and will have to pay the price for your compromises.
If you have a wish, don't go back to the past and redo everything. If you want to change yourself, don't change the past, but change who you are now!
I can't lose against myself. There's no element that would make me lose if our powers are equal. To admit defeat against such an enemy is to declare that I'm wrong.

The storyteller may fall silent, the music may cease, but the story will not end. Be it tragedy or comedy, as long as there is applause, the story will not end. It is just like the multitude of human lives. Warm blessings to we who were not rewarded, and we who are still on our way. Our travels continue on.
I don't have any wishes that won't come true or that are impossible. Because if it's a dream I can't reach by myself, I won't even dream it in the first place.
People die when they are killed.

It feels so close to me, yet I can't reach it even if I hold out my hands. But even if I can't reach it, there are things that will stay in my heart. Being in the same time and looking at the same sky – if I can remember that, then even if we are far apart, I believe we can still be together.
What's past is past. I cannot redo it, nor go back to it. I have escaped from that scene and still continue to live. All I can do is look forward.

Those who aim further for other's sake. Those who think of others before themselves. ...And those who hate themselves more than anyone. These are the qualities of a Magus. This is a contradiction you can only have if you are born broken.
The wish of wanting everyone to be happy is merely a fairy tale!
It is the path you have chosen. Take pride in it.
Hunger is the enemy.
Yes, the seats are limited. There are always fewer seats called "happiness" than there are people to fill them.

Yes, I saw it over and over... Meaningless massacres. Meaningless suffering. Meaningless happiness! I was forced to watch it all. Even when I refused to look, it surrounded me. That isn't what I wished for! I didn't become a Guardian for this!
I don't mind losing to someone, but I won't be beaten by myself.
Saving someone means not saving someone else.
I'm home. What, are you greeting me in an apron? You look pretty good in it.
A lot of something is ugly in itself.
Anything edible is acceptable. Extravagance is our enemy.

I was reckless when I was young. I educated myself by cursing the heartlessness of the world. The world was cruel - so I made myself more heartless and used that as a weapon, trying to follow through on my ideals.
A warrior would rather die, than survive defeat.

Alderamin on the Sky.quote: If you think unconditional kindness is good, and any sort of kindness that comes with conditions is hypocrisy, you should reconsider. People can only achieve as much as the situation allows.
Chasing someone is tiring, and being chased is mentally exhausting. But making someone chase you can be fun.
I'll give you some wise words, Shining Sleepless General. All heroes die of overwork.

Pandora Hearts.quote: *to Jack* If you accept everything you're told without question, you'll lose your ability to think. Even if you reached the same conclusion, it would still be worth analyzing the reasons behind it.
I wonder why illegal contractees try to kill people?
Gilbert, I know everything about you... because we are connected by an extremely deep bond. No matter how far apart we are, we will surely return to the same place. Because that is our fate!
Strength begins in understanding your own weakness.
*to Duke Nightray* You've let your own son die for the honor of your household and other such rubbish. You've lost almost all of your family, and yet all you can think of is your own interests.

Those who come to the Abyss are all the same. They're all desperate to get something back. But everyone goes mad partway. It seems being with the dear dollies - the Chains - is no good for them... Fu fu.. but you were different. You didn't lose yourself, not even at the end.
I went with raven for a long bathroom break.
I am Elliot Nightray and I will not let you take that away from me!!
*to Reim* It means that you have no affinity for chains with fighting skills. You try to avoid violence even when you fight. That's a very good thing.
Aah... I said I'd "answer you" ... Not that I'd "give you a straight answer".
The moment a person says he's working hard without thinking, he's still being naive. He is not trying at all!
It's something that appear on the chests of illegal contractees.
If you accept everything you’re told without question, you’ll lose your ability to think. Even if you reached the same conclusion, it would still be worth analyzing the reasons behind it.
Illegal contractees kill people to be able to change the past.
In the end, aren't they just a bunch of weaklings?

Your so-called "self-sacrifice" only satisfies yourself. Do you think you can save people with it? You're only protecting yourself! You don't know the suffering endured by those left alive. With your childish actions, you're only pushing the pain onto other people!

Kino No Tabi.quote: It's interesting, isn't it? The way that when someone expresses something, someone else always shows up to interpret it.
Being able to forget things you want to forget, and being able to remember things you want to remember, is such a great thing, you know?
The world is not beautiful; and that, in a way, lends it a sort of beauty.

Guilty Crown.quote: A life with no adventure in it is boring. The least a friend can do is stir up a little trouble in your heart.
If you value your peaceful everyday life, protect it for yourself.
Even if everyone calls you a liar, even if you hate yourself, I’ll be on your side.

Hey, Shu, have you ever read a picture book called "The Kind King"? The king was really kind, he gave everyone money and land, until finally... the country was gone. The people were all mad at the king. But I really loved him. I think he was my first love. You're like that king, Shu. The way you lose because of your kindness. You know what? I think you're going to be a great king.
People make a lot of mistakes, and strength is necessary to straighten those out.

Fullmetal Alchemist.quote: Come on now. Is that anyway to talk to your new boss, landlord, and all-around overseer?
I will do what I can, even if my chance of passing is minuscule, if that will allow me to move forward.
I'm as normal as they come and this is a contest of freaks! What do you want me to do, shoot my slingshot at him?
Maybe life has no equal trade, maybe you can give up all you got, and get nothing back. Even if I can't prove it's true, I have to try, for your sake, Al.
Those people had us dancing right in the palms of their hands, didn't they? I guess it doesn't matter what we do. We'll never be the ones in control.
WHO ARE YOU CALLING SO SMALL YOU WANNA CRUSH LIKE AN ANT?!

Men are not men on the battlefield. We turn into some other creature. You can do the cruelest things... It doesn't even matter if it's an order or not. To protect yourself, your mind shuts out any emotions you have. It's like a steel door. But once the war is over, you can't keep it closed forever.
A king is no king without his people. But people without a king are lost as well!
[telling Mustang about the investigation on Scar] His bloodstained clothes washed up further downstream. We don't know if that means that he's dead, or just naked.
Our names are given to us by God. I have betrayed God, and so I no longer have a name.

*grabs two citizens and swings them around in a circle* Shorty?! Could a shorty do this?! What else you want to call me: a half-pint bean-sprout midget?! I'm still growing you backwater desert idiots!

I've been thinking about this for a long time. We put all our trust in alchemy but in the end... what is it? "Alchemy is the science of understanding the flow of matter and its laws. The process of comprehension, deconstruction, and reconstruction. The world flows too. It must also follow laws. Everything circulates. Even death is a part of that circulation. You must accept the flow." Hmm, Teacher sure drummed that into our heads, didn't she? I thought I understood it. But I don't understand anything... Mom proves that. Now here I am again, trying desperately to figure out a way to do the impossible. I'm such a hopeless idiot. All this time and I haven't grown up one bit. I thought maybe the rain would wash away some of this gloom that's been following me... but right now, every drop that hits my face is even more depressing.
I lost my pawns, my knight, my rook, my bishop, and even my queen. But, it's not checkmate, just yet.
If your opponent is of choleric temper, seek to irritate.

Of course! Dogs embody loyalty, they follow their master's commands above all else! Be a jerk to them and they don't complain, and they never once beg for a paycheck! Trust me Fuery, they're the great servants of man! *singing* Loyal canine how we salute thee! *laughs maniacally*

You want to bring back someone that you've lost. You might want money. Maybe you want women. Or, you might want to protect the world. These are all common things people want. Things that their hearts desire. Greed may not be good, but it's not so bad, either. You humans think greed is just for money and power! But everyone wants something they don't have.
Even when our eyes are closed, there's a whole world out there, that lives outside of ourselves and our dreams.
Don't look away, Rose! You need to see what happens when you try to bring a human to life, when you cross into God's territory or whatever the hell it is! Is this what you want?! Look!!
War does not determine who is right - only who is left.
The heroes during times of war, are nothing but mass murderers during times of peace.
When I become Fuhrer President, all female personnel in the military ... will have to wear mini-skirts.
*referring to Alphonse* This pain's nothing...compared to what he's given up...
It's like that myth about the hero... He made wings out of wax so he could fly... but when he got too close to the sun... to God... the wax melted and he crashed to the ground...
By the way, I don't get my skills from a pocketwatch.
Nobody calls me a pipsqueak and gets away with it! Not even a little girl!
*referring to Armstrong taking off his shirt* Did he have to strip?..
I sunk again. *after sinking in the desert*

Killed in action and promoted two ranks for it. Brigadier General Hughes. You were the guy who was supposed to work below me and to push me to the top. Then you get yourself killed and surpass me in the ranks. I don't know what's more absurd, You or the State.
No matter what, if you intend to interfere, I will eliminate you too.
Hughes, just a bit of advice. The soldiers who never shut up about their girls back home... They don't make it.
Some memories... aren't meant to leave traces.

When you live, your life will end sooner or later. The body will return to the earth. Grass and flowers will grow on top of it. The soul will nourish the hearts... and it will live on in the hearts of other people. Everything in this world flows around and circulates. That goes for human lives too.

Memories... of the people we were. They're subtle, but they're real. It took me a lot of time to understand what I saw. Books say we shouldn't have memories. Or at least that they're only the memories and emotions of the alchemists who made us. But they are wrong. Those memories are mine.
Even a piece of garbage has its pride.
There are some things that can only be conveyed through words.

When you notice an insect on the ground, do you stop to consider it a fool? The life of an insect is so beneath you that it would be a waste of your time to even consider judging it. That would be an accurate summation of my feelings towards you, humans.
Hey, mutt! I need exercise, so I'll play with you!

This body comes with many inconveniences. But inconveniences don't make me miserable! There is no reason for you to pity me! My life was put back together with alchemy by my brother. If I deny myself, that would mean I'm denying my brother, along with alchemy. I believe in the potential that alchemy holds. I want to believe in it!
I think people should try to ignore their race, and just treat each other as equals.
Don't give alcohol to minors!
What do I have to live for now that I know Cain won't come back? You tell me that, Ed!
What could be more beautiful than doing work that puts your soul at risk, because that's what it means to be alive!
Nothing's perfect, the world's not perfect, but it's there for us, trying the best it can. That's what makes it so damn beautiful.
There are some things in life that will only be understood through words.
WHO ARE YOU CALLING A MOUSY LITTLE PIPSQUEAK?!
If there's no door, then I'll make one!
Look straight at the people you kill; don't take your eyes off them for a second. And don't ever forget them because they won't forget you.
*to Edward* So, you hooked up with your mechanic, huh? Not too shabby, sprout.

A lesson without pain is meaningless. That's because no one can gain without sacrificing something. But by enduring that pain and overcoming it, he shall obtain a powerful, unmatched heart... A Fullmetal Heart.
You clearly have nerves of steel. But, I'd say you still have much to learn about the world.
The moment a soldier dons his uniform, he accepts that he might be buried in it.
If there is such a thing as the work of the devil, then there's no doubt it's what happened in this incident.
*referring to Winry* I didn't know she could be so cute.
I never feel more human than when I'm fighting real monsters.

The power of one man doesn't amount to much. But, however little strength I'm capable of, I'll do everything humanly possible to protect the people I love, and in turn they will protect the ones they love. It seems like the least we tiny humans can do for each other.

Water, 35 litres. Carbon, 20 kg. Ammonia, 4 litres. Lime, 1.5 kg. Phosphorus, 800 g. Salt, 250 g. Niter, 100 g. Sulphur, 80 g. Fluoride, 7.5 g. Iron, 5 g. Silicon, 3g. And fifteen other elements. Those are the elements to make an average adult human body. You can buy these elemental ingredients at the market with the pocket money of a child. Humans are made so cheaply.
I'm not short! I'm fun-sized!

AHA-HA-HA! Alchemists are scientists. We don't believe in unprovable concepts like "God". *Rose looks angry* We strive to uncover the principles of creation in the matter of the world, to pursue truth... *gazes at Leto statue* it's ironic that we scientists... who don't believe in God... are in a sense the closest things to him.
But you're thinking on too large a scale there, kid... If we don't want to drive ourselves crazy, we can only deal with what's directly in front of us.
I can't tell you that… You have to figure it out. Stand up and walk. Keep moving forward. You've got two good legs. So get up and use them. You're strong enough to make your own path.
*spits out his juice* I don't think so, pops! Do I look like a clown to you?!
Appearances rarely share the whole truth.

Life that has been lost cannot be brought back again. That very truth is what shows us the meaning and value 
of living.
You know, it's funny. Every crook I meet wants to tell me how much I'm just like them. But there's a big difference between you and me and the burdens we bear.

Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu.quote: When you're upset, try making the intelligent decision. And then, you might actually get something you want for a change.
The people laughing are laughing at their own ignorance.
Nobody will be happy being told off for something they never did.
The most important thing when fighting and running away is to defend. It is not about beating the enemy in front of them, but to retreat while buying time for their comrades to retreat.
If so many people believe in this, the lies will become reality. That's the so called group mentality.

It's all right to grieve over your defeat. It's important to admit when you've lost. Not being able to do so makes it impossible for you to climb back up after a fall, and even more impossible, for you to move forward. So go on ahead and grieve to your heart's extent. But after you're done grieving, be sure to set your eyes upon your next goal and move towards it.

People normally say that mood and body have a close relationship. As the heart becomes weaker, the body will fall ill; and as the body falls ill, the heart becomes weaker. Thus, when humans are weak, they will have negative thoughts.

It’s good that good friends can say their true thoughts out, as it shows how good their relationship. It’s something worth celebrating over… but things just won’t be that smooth sailing. Some things are only ‘good’ once they’re hidden. Once others know of the truth, what’s left in the heart may only be regret.

Listen up you guys! This is the final battle! Grit your teeth and get ready to go with all your might! We're only aiming to win! It doesn't matter whether we're idiots or ordinary people or smart people! Everyone's to do whatever they can do! We're definitely... going to win this battle! Just watch, 3rd years...! I'm going to smash those heads of yours and show you how capable these idiots you look down on really are!
No matter what, anyone would hate to be weak as they get plundered. But if there's a chance, even if humans fail to get what they want, they can unexpectedly accept such an outcome.

If she lost because of a difference in ability, it can’t be helped. If she worked hard and didn’t get what she wants, she can just work harder next time. If she gave her all for this, it’s acceptable even if she lost.
Fear comes from within, and isn’t something that can be conquered psychologically in such a short while.

No, I do want to be the hero... But since it’s a rare chance, I want to repay what I borrowed. Uu... how should I say it? I’m really troubled. I bet everything on such an important match, yet I didn't accomplish anything before this thing ends. I can only wish that others can finish off this wish that I would never give up on. Should I be depressed, or angry, or is it an inexplicable feeling... I don't know how to express it, but anyway—
            I’M JUST UNHAPPY THAT I’M NOT THE PROTAGONIST TODAY!
...A human's belief can make the impossible possible.
When people focus on what they want to do, they’ll show off an inexplicable charm.

Jinrui wa Suitai Shimashita.quote: I've never been so grateful to have walls to shut the world out.
I always thought of humans as intelligent dominoes, since they tend to follow each other.
Yes! One small candy for man, one giant candy for new mankind.
Hide the truth. Manipulate information. Use intimidation.
It's simply fun to be part of a group sharing the same interests, regardless of what those interests are.
So, who should we hold responsible? Compensation. Punishment. If you didn't want any problems you shouldn't have taken risks.
A politician in the past once said: "My secretaries did it all."

Hunter X Hunter.quote: If I ignore a friend I have the ability to help, wouldn't I be betraying him?
You should enjoy the little detours. To the fullest. Because that's where you'll find the things more important than what you want.
Assassination — It's the family trade. We all take it up. My folks see me as an exceptional prospect. But I don't see that I should have to live up to their expectations.
It takes a mere second for treasure to turn to trash.
Whenever humans encounter the unknown, they tend to lose perspective.
I do not fear death. I fear only that my rage will fade over time.
Nanika, will you forgive me for being a bad big brother?
People only find me interesting because they can't tell whether I'm serious or not.
In my next life, I want to be me, and meet you again.
Right now, I'm letting you live. And I'll continue to keep you alive... until you've grown enough to become worth killing.
Not killing people is really hard. Clean living is tough.

I've always gone to any lengths to avoid facing danger and risk, hiding myself within  a safe cage, where no one could hurt me. I hated myself for it.. But I couldn't change myself.. Friends and teachers encouraged me, but I never truly listened, considering it the logic of the strong. Yet somehow... A boy with less than half my strength managed to break my cage!
If you want to get to know someone, you need to make an effort to learn why they're angry.

Oyasumi Punpun.quote: As long as the kindness received from others... is returned back, it's fine even if it takes time.
True happiness only lasts for a brief time, so you better enjoy it while you can, right?
Risks are just an unavoidable part of life. Even if you realize the danger, nothing's gonna come from always running away. That way, even when you die, you can be content that you gave it your all.

Although Punpun didn’t really want to think about what the point of having dreams that could never come true was… To have dreams and worries that you could talk frankly about… In a way, that was probably a more fulfilling lifestyle than his own, Punpun admitted. Being cool was merely a paper-thin difference away from being empty.
But once you grow old, you become afraid of even losing things without any value.

Darker than Black.quote: Are you looking at the stars?.. In the middle of the city? Even though the only stars you can see from here are fake?

Inuyasha.quote: I will hunt down Kikyou's killer and avenge her death
Maybe it's just the morning light, but he looks pretty cool standing there with his sword. *about Inuyasha*
You got two legs and a heart beat. What's stopping you?
*to Inuyasha* I quite miss you as well, little brother.
I want you to be happy. I want you to laugh a lot. I don't know what exactly I'll be able to do for you, but I'll always be by your side.
Hey, Shippo. Your village called.They're asking for their idiot!
*to Kikyo* I swear... I will never let Naraku harm you.
[to Kagome, angry at her for saying she believes in him] You are nuts! This sword is good for nothing! Me, I'll live, I'm half demon. You though, you ain't got a chance.
Inuyasha, you and I were fated to never meet again.
Life itself is a frightening image for every human being... being strong in life isn't easy.
He's thanking me? That can't be good. *about Inuyasha*
Be not a fool, I have no such time to waste.
I'm gonna slit your stomach, take out your guts, and put them in a bowl. By the time I'm through with you, you're going to wish it was you who was dead.
Well, well, if it isn't the holy monk.
How could I forget? He's into dead girls.

I'm a half-demon, more egotistical and greedy than any other living creature — that's what human beings are, right?.. But with human blood flowing through my veins, I never give up! Don't you understand? When you have someone to protect, your power increases multifold!
Just apologize, even if you don't mean it. *to some kid, about Inuyasha*

School Rumble.quote: Now, now, these things happen to everyone... EXCEPT ME!!!!! That's for making fun of my masterpiece! If there's one thing I hate, it's criticism!
I CAN DO THAT TOO!" *He takes out a banana and squishes it, giggling evilly*

Natsume Yuujinchou.quote: When I look at their kind smiles and thought that I was supposed to be there smiling too... I couldn't stop crying. It hurt so much that I wanted to forget.

We probably are.  I can't explain it very well, but it seems that lately it doesn't matter, human or spirit.  If your hearts touch, it's the same thing.  When you're all alone, you get lonely, and the first step is always scary.
Snowdrop. I also don't know what I'm looking for. What does the future hold? Will I be able to not forget what I have found?
Until just recently, the stars were something I only saw by myself.

I called his name again and again. And I learned that each time, nothing called back. I learned that no matter how much you want something, how many times you scream to it, sometimes it's out of reach. I decided to stop calling out for someone who would never call back.
As I had encountered kindness, I wanted to be kind myself. I wanted to be able to do something, just like others had done for me.
When you go easy on the ones with just a bit of power, they give you more trouble than anybody else.

Detective Conan.quote: People’s feelings sometimes go astray and lead to irreversible consequences.
A small mistake can make a huge difference.
It’s unbearable to die hating someone.
Sometimes feelings get tangled together with deductions, forming a veil that hides the truth.
There's no such thing as a perfect person in this world.
The sea’s blue reflects because of the sky’s blue. Just like detectives and thieves. We’re all toying with the human mind. But the one who pries for others’ secrets is the one who’s truly impolite.
The only ones that can miss a kick draw match are those who have enough courage to kick it.
The strong one doesn't win. The one who wins is strong.
The right thing is… to have faith in life, until you’re sure of death. That’s what makes a great detective.
If you force me to pick one… It’d be black. It covers up the things inside of me that I don’t want to be known about. Well, for the same reason… Black is the color I hate too.

It’s like an automated vending machine for canned juice. You’ll get what you want so long as you have the money, but… You get nothing in return without it. You can’t buy your way into the hearts of others.
A thief is a creative artist who takes his prey in style... But a detective is nothing more than a critic, who follows our footsteps.
They say time and a people’s heart are inversely proportional. The more it passes, the more they grow apart. It seems there are some rare exceptions though.

She should want to see me. If I had said how I feel about her, she would miss me even more. All this time, I've been breaking her heart by keeping her wait, yet I can't still appear before her eyes. I never want to see her cry anymore. Even if it means I no longer exist in her heart. How immature of me, right?
When people make a mistake, it is nice to give them advice, but... if they don’t listen, just leave them alone. Otherwise you'll do yourself a disservice by wasting your time and effort.
The moon does not mourn over the dead. What it does is shine light on the truth.

If you stay hidden like this, you'll be able to get away from the police, however, you will never escape your crime... Madam, are you trying... Are you trying to force your son to carry this burden for the rest of his life?
If you let anger and revenge consume you... You'll find yourself unable to behold the beautiful sights right before your eyes.
Courage is a word that gives you the strength to do what's right, you should not use it as an excuse to murder someone.
Humans can’t reverse the flow of time. If you try to twist it against its will… You’ll be punished.
I wonder if there really is a God... If such an entity really existed, wouldn't all honest, hard-working people be happy?
If you’re too lucky, people will get jealous of you.
I understand your feelings of wanting to bring the bad guy to justice, but do bear with it. It also requires courage to hide oneself.

If you plan to continue being a detective and using words to entrap people, inscribe this in your hearts: Words are like knives. When used incorrectly, they turn into foul weapons. You have to understand the opponent’s heart and use them with discretion. No matter who it is you’re dealing with.

What value does your will have? I asked you what price it carries. If money is enough, is your will for sale? A will that can be bought with money... what's the meaning of that? If your will can be bought with money... then it will vanish along with that money. Am I wrong?

You can't perform the same trick twice with one audience. If performed only once, the magic leaves a strong impression. It will then blossom into a beautiful miracle in their hearts. But, when used twice, rather than the audience enjoying the magic, they focus on unraveling the trick. As such, the chance of it being unveiled is high.
Justice isn’t something that you can just proclaim. It’s a feeling you should keep near your heart.
Don't judge people from the outside. Like any rose has thorns, the more the person appears nice on the outside, the more you should doubt the inside.
It's better trusting someone than to die doubting people altogether.

Sorry, a trick is nothing but a puzzle mankind came up with. If you use your head, you can uncover the logical answer. It’s disappointing. No matter the explanation I think of, I cannot understand why one person would kill another. Even if I can see why, I can’t understand why.

One Piece.quote: Fools who don't respect the past are likely to repeat it.
There is something mysterious about the life of a pirate.

"If I do this, I can stop the rebellion”, “if I do that, I can stop the rebellion”... Open your eyes, princess! Your zealous idealism disgusts me! Ideals can only be spoken by those powerful enough to carry them out. And that excludes you!

I am lightning. No matter how hard they try, mankind can never overcome lightning. Since ancient times, mankind has labeled the unknowns of nature as God. And anything they could not understand, they feared. Everything which befalls mankind is said to be the work of God. Mankind accepts that it cannot defeat natural disasters. And I am one of them.
I'm the afro-hair guy.
My name is Dracule Mihawk! Find your self, true world, become stronger! No matter how long it may take, I will wait for you in my strongest form! Surpass this sword! Surpass me! Roronoa Zoro!
The world...what a glorious place! Seek freedom, and it will lie stretched out before your eyes. If the endless dream guides your restless spirit, seize it! Raise your flag, and stand tall!
Don't ever think there's any perfect society made by humans!! If you think that way you'll overlook the enemy!! Don't be fooled by appearances!!
Why did he smile? Why? Did he know he would be saved? No. In that instant, he must have understood that his life was going to end. Death. He accepted it. He was fully prepared for it and smiled.
Forgetting is like a wound. The wound may heal but it has already left a scar.
You sure can talk the talk, but you're not quite ready to walk the walk. Time's up, it's my turn.
